initial_message: Should I water my crop?

messages.content: Should I water my crop?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?

messages.content:
For your **Banana Plot (G)**, the current soil moisture readings are:

- Soil Moisture 1: 89% (wet)
- Soil Moisture 2: 95% (wet)

The optimal moisture level is 70%. Since the soil moisture is above the optimal values, **watering is not required as of now**.
messages.en:
For your **Banana Plot (G)**, the current soil moisture readings are:

- Soil Moisture 1: 89% (wet)
- Soil Moisture 2: 95% (wet)

The optimal moisture level is 70%. Since the soil moisture is above the optimal values, **watering is not required as of now**.

initial_message: મારા પાકમાં હવે પછી ક્યારે પિયત આપવાનું થશે

messages.content: મારા પાકમાં હવે પછી ક્યારે પિયત આપવાનું થશે
messages.en: When will my crop be irrigated next
messages.standalone_question: When will I need to irrigate my crop next?
messages.content_transliterated: mara pakaman have pachi kyare piat apavanun thase

messages.content:
તમારા પાક "plot 1" માં હાલની જમીનનું પાણી 93% છે, જે 80% ના આદર્શ પાણીના સ્તરથી વધુ છે. તેથી, હાલમાં પિયત આપવાની જરૂર નથી. 

જો તમે વધુ માહિતી અથવા આગાહી માટે પૂછવા માંગતા હો, તો મને જણાવો!
messages.en:
The current soil water in your crop "plot 1" is 93%, which is above the ideal water level of 80%. Therefore, there is no need to irrigate at present. 

If you'd like to ask for more information or forecasts, let me know!
messages.content_transliterated:
tamara pak "plot 1" man halani jaminanun pani 93% che, jay 80% na adarsh panina starathi vadhu che. tethi, halaman piat apavani jarur nathi. 

jo tame vadhu mahiti athava agahi mate puchava mangata ho, to mane janavo!

messages.content: અંદાજે કેટલા દિવસ પછી પાણી આપવાનું થશે
messages.en: Approximately after how many days will water be given
messages.standalone_question: How many days later will irrigation be needed?
messages.content_transliterated: andaje ketla divas pachi pani apavanun thase

messages.content:
"plot 1" માં હાલની જમીનનું પાણી 93% છે, જે 80% ના આદર્શ પાણીના સ્તરથી વધુ છે. 

આથી, હાલ પિયત આપવાની જરૂર નથી. જો વરસાદ નહીં પડે, તો આગામી 15 દિવસમાં irrigation forecast મુજબ, irrigationની જરૂર પડશે. 

જો તમે વધુ માહિતી અથવા આગાહી માટે પૂછવા માંગતા હો, તો મને જણાવો!
messages.en:
The existing ground water in "Plot 1" is 93%, which is above the ideal water level of 80%. 

Therefore, there is no need to irrigate at present. If it does not rain, then irrigation will be required in the next 15 days as per the irrigation forecast. 

If you'd like to ask for more information or forecasts, let me know!
messages.content_transliterated:
"plot 1" man halani jaminanun pani 93% che, jay 80% na adarsh panina starathi vadhu che. 

aathi, hal piat apavani jarur nathi. jo varsad nahin pade, to agami 15 divasaman irrigation forecast mujab, irrigationknee jarur padse. 

jo tame vadhu mahiti athava agahi mate puchava mangata ho, to mane janavo!

initial_message: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकाला पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. 

**प्लॉटचे नाव:** Plot No 2 Thompson  
**सध्याचे मातीचे आर्द्रता:** 97% आणि 99%  
**आवश्यक आर्द्रता:** 65%  

सध्याची आर्द्रता आवश्यकतेपेक्षा जास्त आहे, त्यामुळे पाणी देणे आवश्यक नाही.
messages.en:
Your crop does not need to be watered. 

**Plot Name:** Plot No 2 Thompson  
**Current soil moisture:** 97% and 99%  
**Required Humidity:** 65%  

The current humidity is more than the requirement, so watering is not necessary.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya pikala pani denyachi avashyakata nahi. 

**plotche nav:** Plot No 2 Thompson  
**sadhyache matiche ardrata:** 97% ani 99%  
**avashyak ardrata:** 65%  

sadhyachi ardrata avashyakatepeksa jast aahe, tyamule pani dene avashyak nahi.

initial_message: पाणी द्यावे का सुधाकर ला

messages.content: पाणी द्यावे का सुधाकर ला
messages.en: Should I give water to Sudhakar
messages.standalone_question: Should I water the Sudhakar plant?
messages.content_transliterated: pani dyave ka sudhakar la

messages.content:
सुधाकर प्लॉटसाठी सध्या मातीची आर्द्रता 23 kPa आणि 28 kPa आहे, जी 30 kPa च्या आदर्श आर्द्रतेच्या खाली आहे. त्यामुळे, तुम्हाला आज (30 नोव्हेंबर 2025) सकाळी 11:27 वाजता पाणी द्यावे लागेल. 

कृपया पाणी देताना या वेळेचा विचार करा.
messages.en:
The current soil moisture for the Sudhakar plot is 23 kPa and 28 kPa, which is below the ideal humidity of 30 kPa. Therefore, you will have to water today (November 30, 2025) at 11:27 am. 

Please consider this time when watering.
messages.content_transliterated:
sudhakar platsathi sadhya matichi aardrata 23 kPa aani 28 kPa aahe, ji 30 kPa chya adarsh ardratechya khali aahe. tyamule, tumhala aaj (30 novehember 2025) sakali 11:27 vajta pani dyave lagel. 

krupaya pani detana ya velecha vichar kara.

activeStage.message: You are above 1 days from estimated stage end of stage Beginning of Bloom, please update your stage on the app

initial_message: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content: आपल्या पिकासाठी योग्य खताची निवड करण्यासाठी, मला आपल्या प्लॉटची माहिती आणि पिकाची स्थिती आवश्यक आहे. कृपया आपला प्लॉट नाव किंवा पिकाची माहिती द्या, जेणेकरून मी आपल्याला योग्य खताची शिफारस करू शकेन.
messages.en: In order to choose the right fertilizer for my crop, I need information about your plot and the condition of the crop. Please provide your plot name or crop information, so that I can recommend you the right fertilizer.
messages.content_transliterated: apalya pikasathi yogy khatachi nivad karanyasathi, mala apalya plotchy mahiti ani pikachi sthiti avashyak aahe. kripaya aapla plot nav kinva pikachi mahiti dya, jenekarun me apalyala yogy khatachi shipharas karu shaken.

initial_message: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content: तुमच्या "मनिक चामन" प्लॉटसाठी पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. सध्या, मातीतील आर्द्रता 89% आणि 64% आहे, जे की 60% च्या आदर्श पातळीपेक्षा जास्त आहे. त्यामुळे, पाणी देणे आवश्यक नाही.
messages.en: There is no need to water your "Manik Chaman" plot. Currently, soil moisture content is 89% and 64%, which is higher than the ideal level of 60%. Therefore, watering is not necessary.
messages.content_transliterated: tumachya "manik chaman" plotsathi pani denyachi avashyakata nahi. sadhya, matitil ardrata 89% ani 64% aahe, j key 60% chya adarsh patalipeksa jast aahe. tyamule, pani dene avashyak nahi.

messages.content: खत कोणते द्यावे
messages.en: Which fertilizer should be given?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I apply?
messages.content_transliterated: khat conte dyave

messages.content:
तुमच्या "मनिक चामन" प्लॉटसाठी, सध्या तुम्ही "बloom beginning" (फुलांचा प्रारंभ) या अवस्थेत आहात. या अवस्थेत, तुम्हाला खालील खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल:

### सध्याचा फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (सप्ताह 1):
1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 3 किलोग्राम/एकर
2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 1 किलोग्राम/एकर (इतर खतांच्या वापरापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे)

### पुढील फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (सप्ताह 2):
1. **11-44-11** - 5.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
2. **Calcium nitrate** - 3 किलोग्राम/एकर (इतर खतांच्या वापरानंतर 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे)
3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3 किलोग्राम/एकर

या खतांचा वापर तुमच्या पिकाच्या वाढीसाठी उपयुक्त ठरेल.
messages.en:
For your "Manik Chaman" plot, you are currently in the "blooming beginning" stage. At this stage, you will need to use the following fertilizers:

### Current Fertigation Schedule (Week 1):
1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 3 kg/acre
2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 1 kg/acre (apply separately for 15-20 minutes before use of other fertilizers)

### Next Fertigation Schedule (Week 2):
1. **11-44-11** - 5.5kg/acre
2. **Calcium nitrate** - 3 kg/acre (to be applied separately for 15-20 minutes after use of other fertilizers)
3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3 kg/acre

The use of these fertilizers will be helpful for the growth of your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "manik chaman" platsathi, sadhya tumhi "bloom beginning" (phulancha prarambh) ya avasthet aahat. ya avasthet, tumhala khalil khatancha vapar karava lagel:

### sadhyacha fertigation schedule (saptah 1):
1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 3 kilogram/acre
2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 1 kilogram/acre (itar khatanchya vaparapurvi 15-20 minite vegale lagoo karave)

### pudhil fertigation schedule (saptah 2):
1. **11-44-11** - 5.5 kilogram/acre
2. **Calcium nitrate** - 3 kilogram/acre (itar khatanchya vaparanantar 15-20 minite vegale lagoo karave)
3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3 kilogram/acre

ya khatancha vapar tumachya pikachya vadhisathi upayukt tharel.

messages.content: फवारणी काय करावी
messages.en: What to spray
messages.standalone_question: What kind of spraying should be done for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: favarani kay karavi

messages.content:
तुमच्या "मनिक चामन" प्लॉटसाठी आज कोणतीही फवारणी करण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. 

1. **रोग-कीटक फवारणी शेड्यूल**: आजसाठी कोणतीही फवारणी शेड्यूल उपलब्ध नाही.
2. **किसान क्रियाकलाप**: आज तुमच्याकडून कोणतीही क्रिया केलेली नाही.
3. **फवारणी परिस्थिती**: फवारणीच्या परिस्थितीची तपासणी करता आलेली नाही.

तुमच्या पिकाच्या आरोग्यासाठी, जर तुम्हाला काही विशिष्ट समस्या किंवा चिंता असतील, तर कृपया सांगा.
messages.en:
There is no need to do any spraying today for your "Manik Chaman" plot. 

1. **Disease-Pest Spraying Schedule**: There is no spraying schedule available for today.
2. **Kisan Activity**: No action has been taken by you today.
3. **Spraying Conditions**: The spraying conditions could not be checked.

If you have any specific issues or concerns for the health of your crop, please let us know.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "manik chaman" plotsathi aj konatihi favarani karanyachi avashyakata nahi. 

1. **rog-kitak favarani schedule**: ajasathi konatihi favarani schedule upalabdh nahi.
2. **kisan kriyakalap**: aj tumachyakadun konatihi kriya keleli nahi.
3. **favarani paristhiti**: phavaranichya paristhitichi tapasani karata aleli nahi.

tumachya pikachya aarogyasathi, jar tumhala kahi vishist samasya kinva chinta asatil, tar kripaya sanga.

messages.content: Thrips साठी काय फवारणी करावी
messages.en: What to spray for thrips
messages.standalone_question: What spray should be applied for Thrips?
messages.content_transliterated: Thrips sathi kay favarani karavi

messages.content:
तुमच्या "मनिक चामन" प्लॉटसाठी थ्रिप्ससाठी कोणतीही फवारणी शेड्यूल उपलब्ध नाही. 

1. **रोग-कीटक फवारणी शेड्यूल**: सध्या कोणतीही फवारणी शेड्यूल नाही.
2. **किसान क्रियाकलाप**: आज तुमच्याकडून कोणतीही क्रिया केलेली नाही.
3. **फवारणी परिस्थिती**: फवारणीच्या परिस्थितीची तपासणी करता आलेली नाही.

जर तुम्हाला थ्रिप्ससाठी विशेष फवारणीची आवश्यकता असेल, तर कृपया योग्य कीटकनाशकांचा वापर करा, जसे की **Imidacloprid** किंवा **Thiamethoxam**. तुम्ही या कीटकनाशकांचा वापर करून थ्रिप्सवर नियंत्रण ठेवू शकता.
messages.en:
There is no spraying schedule available for thrips for your "Manik Chaman" plot. 

1. **Disease-Pest Spraying Schedule**: There is currently no spraying schedule.
2. **Kisan Activity**: No action has been taken by you today.
3. **Spraying Conditions**: The spraying conditions could not be checked.

If you need a special spray for thrips, please use the appropriate insecticides, such as **Imidacloprid** or **Thiamethoxam**. You can control thrips by using these insecticides.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "manik chaman" plotsathi thripsasathi konatihi favarani schedule upalabdh nahi. 

1. **rog-kitak favarani schedule**: sadhya konatihi favarani schedule nahi.
2. **kisan kriyakalap**: aj tumachyakadun konatihi kriya keleli nahi.
3. **favarani paristhiti**: phavaranichya paristhitichi tapasani karata aleli nahi.

jar tumhala thripsasathi vishes favaranichi avashyakata asel, tar kripaya yogy kitakanashakancha vapar kara, jase key **Imidacloprid** kinva **Thiamethoxam**. tumhi ya kitakanashakancha vapar karun thripswor niyantran thevu shakata.

initial_message: ગયા અઠવાડિયામાં મારા પાકને કયા રોગો કે જીવાતોએ અસર કરી?

messages.content: ગયા અઠવાડિયામાં મારા પાકને કયા રોગો કે જીવાતોએ અસર કરી?
messages.en: What diseases or pests have affected my crop in the past week?
messages.standalone_question: What diseases or pests affected my crop last week?
messages.content_transliterated: gaya athavadiyaman mara pakane kaya rogo ke jivatoe asar curry?

messages.content: ગયા અઠવાડિયામાં "Road valo Plot" પર કોઈ રોગો કે જીવાતોની અસરની માહિતી ઉપલબ્ધ નથી. જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ તો કૃપા કરીને પૂછો.
messages.en: No disease or pest impact information is available on the "Road valo Plot" in the past week. Please ask if you would like more information.
messages.content_transliterated: gaya athavadiyaman "Road valo Plot" per koi rogo ke jivatoni asarani mahiti upalabdh nathi. jo tamne vadhu mahiti joie to krupa karine puchho.

initial_message: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?

messages.content: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?
messages.en: Which fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mara pak mate kayu khatar vaparvu?

messages.content:
તમારા પાક માટે ખાતર વાપરવાની સૂચનાઓ નીચે મુજબ છે:

### 1. **પ્લોટ: જયેશભાઈ વાલો પ્લોટ 2**
- **પાક: તંબાકુ**
- **વર્તમાન તબક્કો: પાક સ્થાપના (Crop establishment)**
- **તબક્કાની શરૂઆતની તારીખ: 29 નવેમ્બર 2025**
- **વર્તમાન સપ્તાહ: 1**

#### **ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:**
- **ખાતરો:**
  1. **ફાર્મયાર્ડ મેન્યુર:** 4000 કિગ્રા/એકર
  2. **ઝિંક સલ્ફેટ:** 5 કિગ્રા/એકર
  3. **10-26-26:** 67 કિગ્રા/એકર
  4. **યૂરિયા:** 54 કિગ્રા/એકર
  5. **મ્યુરેટ ઓફ પોટાશ:** 3.5 કિગ્રા/એકર

- **આગામી તબક્કો: પ્રારંભિક વેગેટેટિવ વૃદ્ધિ (Early vegetative growth)**
  - **શરૂઆતની તારીખ:** 20 ડિસેમ્બર 2025
  - **ખાતરો:**
    1. **12-61-0:** 2 કિગ્રા/એકર
    2. **એમોનિયમ સલ્ફેટ:** 5.5 કિગ્રા/એકર

### 2. **પ્લોટ: મુકેશભાઈ વાલો પ્લોટ 1**
- **પાક: તંબાકુ**
- **વર્તમાન તબક્કો: પાક સ્થાપના (Crop establishment)**
- **તબક્કાની શરૂઆતની તારીખ: 21 નવેમ્બર 2025**
- **ફર્ટિગેશન ડેટા શેડ્યૂલ ઉપલબ્ધ નથી.**

જો તમને વધુ માહિતીની જરૂર હોય, તો કૃપા કરીને પૂછો!
messages.en:
The instructions for using fertilizer for your crop are as follows:

### 1. **Plot: Jayeshbhai Valo Plot 2**
- **Crop: Tobacco**
- **Current stage: Crop establishment**
**Start date of phase: 29 November 2025**
- **Current week: 1**

#### **Fertigation Schedule:**
- **Assurances:**
  1. **Farmyard Manual:** 4000 kg/acre
  2. **Zinc Sulphate:** 5 kg/acre
  3. **10-26-26:** 67 kg/acre
  4. **Urea:** 54 kg/acre
  5. **Muriate of Potash:** 3.5 kg/acre

- **Next stage: Early vegetative growth**
  - **Start Date:** 20 December 2025
  - **Assurances:**
    1. **12-61-0:** 2 kg/acre
    2. **Ammonium Sulphate:** 5.5 kg/acre

### 2. **Plot: Mukeshbhai Valo Plot 1**
- **Crop: Tobacco**
- **Current stage: Crop establishment**
**Start date of phase: 21st November 2025**
- **Fertigation data schedule is not available.**

If you need more information, please ask!

initial_message: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?

messages.content: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?
messages.en: Which fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mara pak mate kayu khatar vaparvu?

messages.content:
તમારા પાક માટે, હાલની સ્થિતિ "વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ" (Vegetative Growth) છે, જે 2025-11-23 થી શરૂ થઈ છે. અહીં ફર્ટિગેશન માટેની સૂચનાઓ છે:

### હાલનું ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ (હાલમાં 1મી સપ્તાહ):
1. **1મો દિવસ (30 નવેમ્બર 2025)**:
   - **હ્યુમિક એસિડ**: 1 લિટર/એકર
   - નોંધ: ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડને અન્ય ખાતરોની એપ્લિકેશન કરતા 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા અલગથી લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.

2. **4મો દિવસ (3 ડિસેમ્બર 2025)**:
   - **વિકલ્પ 1**:
     - 12-61-0: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
     - યુરિયા: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **વિકલ્પ 2**:
     - 24-24-0: 16 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **વિકલ્પ 3**:
     - યુરિયા: 7.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
     - ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80%: 5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - નોંધ: ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડને અન્ય ખાતરોની એપ્લિકેશન કરતા 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા અલગથી લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.

### આગામી ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:
- **2મો સપ્તાહ**:
  - **1મો દિવસ (16 જાન્યુઆરી 2026)**: યુરિયા: 10 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
  - **4મો દિવસ (19 જાન્યુઆરી 2026)**:
    - 12-61-0: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
    - એમોનિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 7.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
    - મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

આ માહિતીનો ઉપયોગ કરીને, તમે તમારા પાક માટે યોગ્ય ખાતરનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો.
messages.en:
For your crop, the current status is "Vegetative Growth", which has started from 2025-11-23. Here are the instructions for fertigation:

### Current fertigation schedule (currently 1st week):
1. **1st Day (30 November 2025)**:
   - **Humic Acid**: 1 liter/acre
   - Note: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.

2. **4th Day (3rd December 2025)**:
   - **Option 1**:
     - 12-61-0: 6 kg/acre
     - Urea: 6 kg/acre
   - **Option 2**:
     - 24-24-0: 16 kg/acre
   - **Option 3**:
     - Urea: 7.5 kg/acre
     - Phosphoric Acid 80%: 5 kg/acre
   - Note: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.

### Upcoming fertigation schedule:
- **2nd Week**:
  - **1st Day (16 January 2026)**: Urea: 10 kg/acre
  - **4th Day (19 January 2026)**:
    - 12-61-0: 6 kg/acre
    - Ammonium Sulphate: 7.5 kg/acre
    - Magnesium sulphate: 5 kg/acre

Using this information, you can use the right fertilizer for your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tamara pak mate, halani sthiti "vegetative growth" (Vegetative Growth) che, jay 2025-11-23 thi sharu thai che. ahi fertigation mateni sucanao che:

### halanun fertigation schedule (halaman 1me saptah):
1. **1mo divas (30 november 2025)**:
   - **humic acid**: 1 litre/acre
   - nondh: phosphoric esidane any khataroni application karta 15-20 minute pela alagathi lagu karvu joie.

2. **4mo divas (3 december 2025)**:
   - **vikalp 1**:
     - 12-61-0: 6 kilogram/acre
     - yuriya: 6 kilogram/acre
   - **vikalp 2**:
     - 24-24-0: 16 kilogram/acre
   - **vikalp 3**:
     - yuriya: 7.5 kilogram/acre
     - phosphoric acid 80%: 5 kilogram/acre
   - nondh: phosphoric esidane any khataroni application karta 15-20 minute pela alagathi lagu karvu joie.

### agami fertigation schedule:
- **2mo saptah**:
  - **1mo divas (16 january 2026)**: yuriya: 10 kilogram/acre
  - **4mo divas (19 january 2026)**:
    - 12-61-0: 6 kilogram/acre
    - ammonium sulphate: 7.5 kilogram/acre
    - magnesium sulphate: 5 kilogram/acre

a mahitino upayog karine, tame tamara pak mate yogy khatarano upayog kari shako cho.

initial_message: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "Banana plot 3" साठी, सध्या तुम्ही "Grand growth" टप्प्यात आहात, जो 29 नोव्हेंबर 2025 पासून सुरू झाला आहे. या टप्प्यात, तुम्हाला पुढील खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल:

### सध्याचा फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (सप्ताह 1):
1. **फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:**
   - **12-61-0**: 2 किलोग्राम/प्लांट
   - **Urea**: 9 किलोग्राम/प्लांट
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 3.5 किलोग्राम/प्लांट

   किंवा

   - **24-24-0**: 7 किलोग्राम/प्लांट
   - **Urea**: 6 किलोग्राम/प्लांट
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 3.5 किलोग्राम/प्लांट

   किंवा

   - **Urea**: 9.5 किलोग्राम/प्लांट
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 2 किलोग्राम/प्लांट
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 3.5 किलोग्राम/प्लांट

2. **मातीच्या अनुप्रयोग पद्धतीने:**
   - **Urea**: 75 किलोग्राम/प्लांट
   - **Muriate of Potash**: 146 किलोग्राम/प्लांट

### नोट:
- फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल इतर खतांच्या अनुप्रयोगापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे.

तुमच्या पुढील फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूलसाठी, तुम्हाला 7 मार्च 2026 पासून सुरू होणाऱ्या दुसऱ्या आठवड्यात खालील खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल:
- **Potassium Nitrate**: 7 किलोग्राम/प्लांट
- **Urea**: 7.5 किलोग्राम/प्लांट
- **Calcium nitrate**: 3 किलोग्राम/प्लांट

कृपया या शेड्यूलनुसार खतांचा वापर करा.
messages.en:
For your "Banana plot 3", you are currently in the "Grand growth" phase, which has started on November 29, 2025. During this stage, you'll need to use the following fertilizers:

### Current Fertigation Schedule (Week 1):
1. **Fertigation Method:**
   - **12-61-0**: 2kg/plant
   - **Urea**: 9kg/plant
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 3.5 kg/plant

or

- **24-24-0**: 7kg/plant
   - **Urea**: 6kg/plant
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 3.5 kg/plant

or

- **Urea**: 9.5 kg/plant
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 2 kg/plant
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 3.5 kg/plant

2. **Soil Application Method:**
   - **Urea**: 75kg/plant
   - **Muriate of Potash**: 146 kg/plant

### Note:
Phosphoric acid should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.

For your next fertigation schedule, you will need to use the following fertilizers in the second week starting March 7, 2026:
- **Potassium Nitrate**: 7 kg/plant
- **Urea**: 7.5 kg/plant
- **Calcium nitrate**: 3 kg/plant

Please use fertilizers according to this schedule.

   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 3.5 kilogram/plant

kinva

messages.en: Which fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mara pak mate kayu khatar vaparvu?

messages.content:
Here are the fertigation recommendations for your plots:

### 1. **Dela Valu**
- **Current Stage:** Vegetative growth (Week 1)
- **Today (Nov 30, 2025):**
  - **Day 1:** 
    - Apply **Humic acid**: 1 liter/acre.
  - **Day 4 (Dec 3, 2025):**
    - Apply **12-61-0**: 6 kg/acre and **Urea**: 5 kg/acre.
    - Alternatively, you can use **24-24-0**: 16 kg/acre or **Urea**: 6.5 kg/acre with **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 4.5 kg/acre.
  
### 2. **Khejada Valu**
- **Current Stage:** Vegetative growth (Week 2)
- **Today (Nov 30, 2025):**
  - **Day 1:** 
    - Apply **Urea**: 9 kg/acre.
  - **Day 4 (Dec 3, 2025):**
    - Apply **12-61-0**: 4 kg/acre, **Ammonium Sulphate**: 7.5 kg/acre, and **Magnesium Sulphate**: 5 kg/acre.
    - Alternatively, you can use **24-24-0**: 8.5 kg/acre with **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 1 kg/acre.

### 3. **Patsala**
- **Current Stage:** Vegetative growth (Week 2)
- **Today (Nov 30, 2025):** 
  - **No fertigation needed.**
- **Next Schedule:**
  - For **Flowering Stage (Week 1)**, apply **Ammonium Sulphate**: 43 kg/acre and **Sulfate of Potash**: 32 kg/acre.

Make sure to apply **Phosphoric acid** separately, 15-20 minutes before other fertilizers when required.

initial_message: શું મને મારી પાકને પાણી આપવું જોઈએ?

messages.content: શું મને મારી પાકને પાણી આપવું જોઈએ?
messages.en: Should I water my crops?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: shu mane mari pakane pani apvu joie?

messages.content:
**પાકને પાણી આપવું જોઈએ કે નહીં:**

1. **રાઠાબોડુ (rathabodu)**:
   - **માટીના ભેજ**: 100% (ખૂબ ભેજવાળું)
   - **ઓપ્ટિમલ ભેજ**: 70%
   - **નિર્ણય**: પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી.

2. **રાઠાબોડી મુખ્ય ઉપકરણ (tabelawalichawdi)**:
   - **માટીના ભેજ**: 15 kPa (સામાન્ય)
   - **ઓપ્ટિમલ ભેજ**: 20 kPa
   - **નિર્ણય**: પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી.

3. **પેપલાવલુ (narsangavaru)**:
   - **માટીના ભેજ**: 100% (ખૂબ ભેજવાળું)
   - **ઓપ્ટિમલ ભેજ**: 70%
   - **નિર્ણય**: પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી.

**ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:**

- **રાઠાબોડુ**:
  - **હાલની સ્થિતિ**: પાક સ્થાપન (Crop establishment)
  - **હાલની સપ્તાહ**: 1
  - **આવતી કાલ**: 2025-12-19 (વૃક્ષ વૃદ્ધિ માટે)
  
- **રાઠાબોડી મુખ્ય ઉપકરણ**:
  - **હાલની સ્થિતિ**: પાક સ્થાપન (Crop establishment)
  - **હાલની સપ્તાહ**: 2
  - **આવતી કાલ**: 2025-12-10 (વૃક્ષ વૃદ્ધિ માટે)

- **પેપલાવલુ**:
  - **હાલની સ્થિતિ**: પાક સ્થાપન (Crop establishment)
  - **હાલની સપ્તાહ**: 2
  - **આવતી કાલ**: 2025-12-08 (વૃક્ષ વૃદ્ધિ માટે)

**કૃપા કરીને નોંધો**: હાલ પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી, પરંતુ ફર્ટિગેશન માટેની તૈયારી રાખો.
messages.en:
**Whether the crop should be watered or not:**

1. **Rathabodu**:
   - **Soil moisture**: 100% (very humid)
   - **Optimal humidity**: 70%
   - **Decision**: No need to water.

2. **Rathabodi Main Instrument (Tabelawalichawdi)**:
   - **Soil moisture**: 15 kPa (normal)
   - **Optimal humidity**: 20 kPa
   - **Decision**: No need to water.

3. **Peplavalu (narsangavaru)**:
   - **Soil moisture**: 100% (very humid)
   - **Optimal humidity**: 70%
   - **Decision**: No need to water.

**Fertigation Schedule:**

- **Rathabodu**:
  - **Current Status**: Crop Establishment
  - **Current week**: 1
  - **Tomorrow**: 2025-12-19 (for tree growth)
  
- **Rathabodi Main Device**:
  - **Current Status**: Crop Establishment
  - **Current week**: 2
  - **Tomorrow**: 2025-12-10 (for tree growth)

- **Peplavalu**:
  - **Current Status**: Crop Establishment
  - **Current week**: 2
  - **Tomorrow**: 2025-12-08 (for tree growth)

**Please note**: There is no need to water at this time, but be prepared for fertigation.
messages.content_transliterated:
**pakane pani apvu joie ke nahin:**

1. **rathabodu (rathabodu)**:
   - **matina bhej**: 100% (khub bhejavalun)
   - **optimal bhej**: 70%
   - **nirnay**: pani apavani jarur nathi.

2. **rathabodi mukhy upakaran (tabelawalichawdi)**:
   - **matina bhej**: 15 kPa (samany)
   - **optimal bhej**: 20 kPa
   - **nirnay**: pani apavani jarur nathi.

3. **pepalavalu (narsangavaru)**:
   - **matina bhej**: 100% (khub bhejavalun)
   - **optimal bhej**: 70%
   - **nirnay**: pani apavani jarur nathi.

**fertigation schedule:**

- **rathabodu**:
  - **halani sthiti**: pak sthapan (Crop establishment)
  - **halani saptah**: 1
  - **avati kaal**: 2025-12-19 (vriksh vriddhi mate)
  
- **rathabodi mukhy upakaran**:
  - **halani sthiti**: pak sthapan (Crop establishment)
  - **halani saptah**: 2
  - **avati kaal**: 2025-12-10 (vriksh vriddhi mate)

- **pepalavalu**:
  - **halani sthiti**: pak sthapan (Crop establishment)
  - **halani saptah**: 2
  - **avati kaal**: 2025-12-08 (vriksh vriddhi mate)

**krupa karine nondho**: hal pani apavani jarur nathi, parantu fertigation mateni taiyari rakho.

messages.content: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?
messages.en: Which fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mara pak mate kayu khatar vaparvu?

messages.content:
તમારા પાક માટે, હાલની સ્થિતિ "વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ" (Vegetative Growth) છે, જે 2મી સપ્તાહમાં છે. અહીં ફર્ટિગેશન માટેની સૂચનાઓ છે:

### હાલની સપ્તાહની ફર્ટિગેશન:
1. **દિવસ 1**:
   - **યુરિયા**: 10 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

2. **દિવસ 4**:
   - **ફર્ટિલાઇઝર મિશ્રણ**:
     - 12-61-0: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
     - એમોનિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 7.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
     - મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **નોંધ**: ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડને અન્ય ખાતરોની એપ્લિકેશનથી 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા અલગથી લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.

### આગામી ફર્ટિગેશન:
- **3મી સપ્તાહ** (2026-01-17 થી શરૂ):
  - **દિવસ 1**: યુરિયા: 10 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
  - **દિવસ 4**: 
    - 12-61-0: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
    - યુરિયા: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
    - મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

આ સૂચનાઓને અનુસરીને ખાતરનો ઉપયોગ કરો.
messages.en:
For your crop, the current condition is "vegetative growth", which is in the 2nd week. Here are the instructions for fertigation:

### This week's fertigation:
1. **Day 1**:
   - **Urea**: 10 kg/acre

2. **Day 4**:
   - **Fertilizer Mixture**:
     - 12-61-0: 6 kg/acre
     - Ammonium Sulphate: 7.5 kg/acre
     - Magnesium sulphate: 5 kg/acre
   **Note**: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.

### Next Fertigation:
- **3rd Week** (Starting from 2026-01-17):
  - **Day 1**: Urea: 10 kg/acre
  - **Day 4**: 
    - 12-61-0: 6 kg/acre
    - Urea: 6 kg/acre
    - Magnesium sulphate: 5 kg/acre

Use fertilizer by following these instructions.
messages.content_transliterated:
tamara pak mate, halani sthiti "vegetative growth" (Vegetative Growth) che, j 2me saptahaman che. ahi fertigation mateni sucanao che:

### halani saptahani fertigation:
1. **divas 1**:
   - **yuriya**: 10 kilogram/acre

2. **divas 4**:
   - **fertilizer mishran**:
     - 12-61-0: 6 kilogram/acre
     - ammonium sulphate: 7.5 kilogram/acre
     - magnesium sulphate: 5 kilogram/acre
   - **nondh**: phosphoric esidane any khataroni eplikeshanathi 15-20 minute pela alagathi lagu karvu joie.

### agami fertigation:
- **3me saptah** (2026-01-17 thi sharu):
  - **divas 1**: yuriya: 10 kilogram/acre
  - **divas 4**: 
    - 12-61-0: 6 kilogram/acre
    - yuriya: 6 kilogram/acre
    - magnesium sulphate: 5 kilogram/acre

a sucanaone anusarine khatarano upayog karo.

initial_message: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकासाठी (द्राक्षे) खालील खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल:

### Plot No 1 SSN
- **सध्याची अवस्था:** Bloom Beginning (सुरुवात)
- **सध्याचा आठवडा:** 1
- **खतांचा वापर:**
  - **Mono potassium phosphate:** 3.5 kg/acre
  - **Phosphoric acid 80%:** 1.5 kg/acre (इतर खतांच्या आधी 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे)

### Plot No 2 Crimson
- **सध्याची अवस्था:** Bloom Beginning (सुरुवात)
- **सध्याचा आठवडा:** 3
- **खतांचा वापर:** सध्या कोणतेही खत लागवड आवश्यक नाही.

### Sudhakar
- **सध्याची अवस्था:** Fruit Set
- **सध्याचा आठवडा:** 1
- **खतांचा वापर:**
  - **Phosphoric acid 80%:** 1.5 kg/acre (इतर खतांच्या आधी 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे)
  - **Calcium nitrate:** 4 kg/acre (इतर खतांच्या 15-20 मिनिटे नंतर लागू करावे)
  - **11-44-11:** 5.5 kg/acre
  - **Sulfate of Potash:** 3.5 kg/acre
  - **Magnesium Sulphate:** 1.5 kg/acre

### Sudhakar 2
- **सध्याची अवस्था:** Berry Development
- **सध्याचा आठवडा:** 1
- **खतांचा वापर:**
  - **Phosphoric acid 80%:** 3.5 kg/acre (इतर खतांच्या आधी 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे)
  - **Calcium nitrate:** 1.5 kg/acre (इतर खतांच्या 15-20 मिनिटे नंतर लागू करावे)
  - **11-44-11:** 6.5 kg/acre
  - **Sulfate of Potash:** 3.5 kg/acre
  - **Magnesium Sulphate:** 1.5 kg/acre

कृपया या खतांचा वापर करताना योग्य पद्धतीने लागू करा.
messages.en:
The following fertilizers will need to be used for your crop (grapes):

### Plot No 1 SSN
- **Current Status:** Bloom Beginning
- **Current Week:** 1
- **Fertilizer Use:**
  - **Mono potassium phosphate:** 3.5 kg/acre
  - **Phosphoric acid 80%:** 1.5 kg/acre (apply separately 15-20 minutes before other fertilizers)

### Plot No 2 Crimson
- **Current Status:** Bloom Beginning
- **Current Week:** 3
- **Fertilizer Application:** No fertilizer cultivation is currently required.

### Sudhakar
- **Current Status:** Fruit Set
- **Current Week:** 1
- **Fertilizer Use:**
  - **Phosphoric acid 80%:** 1.5 kg/acre (apply separately 15-20 minutes before other fertilizers)
  - **Calcium nitrate:** 4 kg/acre (to be applied after 15-20 minutes of other fertilizers)
  - **11-44-11:** 5.5 kg/acre
  - **Sulfate of Potash:** 3.5 kg/acre
  - **Magnesium Sulphate:** 1.5 kg/acre

### Sudhakar 2
- **Current Status:** Berry Development
- **Current Week:** 1
- **Fertilizer Use:**
  - **Phosphoric acid 80%:** 3.5 kg/acre (apply separately 15-20 minutes before other fertilizers)
  - **Calcium nitrate:** 1.5 kg/acre (to be applied 15-20 minutes after other fertilizers)
  - **11-44-11:** 6.5 kg/acre
  - **Sulfate of Potash:** 3.5 kg/acre
  - **Magnesium Sulphate:** 1.5 kg/acre

Please apply these fertilizers properly when using.

- **sadhyachi avastha:** Bloom Beginning (suruvat)
- **sadhyacha athavada:** 1
- **khatancha vapar:**
  - **Mono potassium phosphate:** 3.5 kg/acre
  - **Phosphoric acid 80%:** 1.5 kg/acre (itar khatanchya aadhi 15-20 minite vegale lagoo karave)

### Plot No 2 Crimson
- **sadhyachi avastha:** Bloom Beginning (suruvat)
- **sadhyacha athavada:** 3
- **khatancha vapar:** sadhya kontehi khat lagavad aavashyak nahi.

### Sudhakar
- **sadhyachi avastha:** Fruit Set
- **sadhyacha athavada:** 1
- **khatancha vapar:**
  - **Phosphoric acid 80%:** 1.5 kg/acre (itar khatanchya aadhi 15-20 minite vegale lagoo karave)
  - **Calcium nitrate:** 4 kg/acre (itar khatanchya 15-20 minite nantar lagoo karave)
  - **11-44-11:** 5.5 kg/acre
  - **Sulfate of Potash:** 3.5 kg/acre
  - **Magnesium Sulphate:** 1.5 kg/acre

### Sudhakar 2
- **sadhyachi avastha:** Berry Development
- **sadhyacha athavada:** 1
- **khatancha vapar:**
  - **Phosphoric acid 80%:** 3.5 kg/acre (itar khatanchya aadhi 15-20 minite vegale lagoo karave)
  - **Calcium nitrate:** 1.5 kg/acre (itar khatanchya 15-20 minite nantar lagoo karave)
  - **11-44-11:** 6.5 kg/acre
  - **Sulfate of Potash:** 3.5 kg/acre
  - **Magnesium Sulphate:** 1.5 kg/acre

krupaya ya khatancha vapar kartana yogya paddhatine lagoo kara.

initial_message: શું મને મારી પાકને પાણી આપવું જોઈએ?

messages.content: શું મને મારી પાકને પાણી આપવું જોઈએ?
messages.en: Should I water my crops?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: shu mane mari pakane pani apvu joie?

messages.content:
તમારા પાકને પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી. 

**પાકનું નામ:** નગરવલુકેટર  
**વર્તમાન મૃદા ભેજ:** 100% (ખૂબ ભેજવાળું)  
**ઓપ્ટિમલ મૃદા ભેજ:** 70%  

મૃદા ભેજ ઓપ્ટિમલ મર્યાદા કરતાં વધુ છે, તેથી હાલ પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી.
messages.en:
There is no need to water your crops. 

**Name of the crop:** Nagarvalucator  
**Current mild humidity:** 100% (very humid)  
**Optimal humidity:** 70%  

The moisture content is above the optimal limit, so there is no need to water at present.
messages.content_transliterated:
tamara pakane pani apavani jarur nathi. 

**pakanun nam:** nagaravaluketar  
**vartaman mrida bhej:** 100% (khub bhejavalun)  
**optimal mrida bhej:** 70%  

mrida bhej optimal maryada karatan vadhu che, tethi hal pani apavani jarur nathi.

initial_message: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकांना पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. 

1. **Manik chaman plot 1**: 
   - मातीतील आर्द्रता: 91% (पहिला सेंसर), 87% (दुसरा सेंसर)
   - आदर्श आर्द्रता: 60%
   - सध्या पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही, कारण मातीतील आर्द्रता आदर्श आर्द्रतेच्या वर आहे.

2. **ssn plot**: 
   - मातीतील आर्द्रता: 85% (पहिला सेंसर), 100% (दुसरा सेंसर)
   - आदर्श आर्द्रता: 60%
   - सध्या पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही, कारण मातीतील आर्द्रता आदर्श आर्द्रतेच्या वर आहे.

तुमच्या पिकांना सध्या पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही.
messages.en:
Your crops do not need to be watered. 

1. **Manik chaman plot 1**: 
   - Soil humidity: 91% (first sensor), 87% (second sensor)
   - Ideal humidity: 60%
   - There is no need to water at present, as soil moisture is above ideal humidity.

2. **ssn plot**: 
   - Soil humidity: 85% (first sensor), 100% (second sensor)
   - Ideal humidity: 60%
   - There is no need to water at present, as soil moisture is above ideal humidity.

Your crops do not need to be watered right now.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya pikanna pani denyachi avashyakata nahi. 

1. **Manik chaman plot 1**: 
   - matitil ardrata: 91% (pahila sensor), 87% (dusara sensor)
   - adarsh ardrata: 60%
   - sadhya pani denyachi avashyakata nahi, karan matitil ardrata adarsh ardratechya var aahe.

2. **ssn plot**: 
   - matitil ardrata: 85% (pahila sensor), 100% (dusara sensor)
   - adarsh ardrata: 60%
   - sadhya pani denyachi avashyakata nahi, karan matitil ardrata adarsh ardratechya var aahe.

tumachya pikanna sadhya pani denyachi avashyakata nahi.

messages.content:
Here is the fertigation schedule for your farms:

### 1. **Arjun farm (પાકણ)**
- **Current Stage:** Vegetative growth (Started on 27-Nov-2025)
- **Current Week Schedule:**
  - **Day 1:** 
    - Apply **Humic acid**: 1 liter/acre
    - Note: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately, 15-20 minutes before other fertilizers.
  - **Day 4:** 
    - Options:
      - **12-61-0**: 6 kg/acre + **Urea**: 4.5 kg/acre
      - **24-24-0**: 11.5 kg/acre + **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 1.5 kg/acre
      - **Urea**: 6 kg/acre + **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 5 kg/acre

    - Options:
      - **12-61-0**: 6 kg/acre + **Urea**: 4.5 kg/acre

      - **12-61-0**: 6 kg/acre + **Urea**: 4.5 kg/acre

messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?

messages.content:
**Datta's plot**: तुमच्या प्लॉटची रिचार्ज कालावधी संपली आहे, त्यामुळे डेटा पाहण्यासाठी कृपया रिचार्ज करा.

**Plot No.1**: तुमच्या प्लॉटमध्ये मातीची आर्द्रता 58% आणि 73% आहे, ज्यामुळे पाणी देणे शक्य आहे, कारण एक किंवा दोन्ही मातीच्या आर्द्रतेचे प्रमाण कमी आहे. 

तुम्हाला Plot No.1 साठी पाणी देणे आवश्यक आहे.
messages.en:
**Datta's plot**: The recharge period of your plot is over, so please recharge to view the data.

**Plot No.1**: The soil moisture in your plot is 58% and 73%, which makes it possible to water, as one or both soil moisture content is low. 

You need to provide water for Plot No.1.
messages.content_transliterated:

**Plot No.1**: tumachya platmadhye matichi aardrata 58% aani 73% aahe, jyamule paani dene shakya aahe, karan ek kinva donhi matichya ardrateche praman kami aahe. 

tumhala Plot No.1 sathi pani dene avashyak ahe.

messages.content:
### Current Condition of Potato Crop

**TARAK Plot:**
- **Active Stage:** Vegetative Growth (Started on 24th November 2025)
- **Fertigation Schedule:**
  - **Today (30th November 2025):**
    - **Day 1:** Apply 1 liter of Humic Acid per acre.
    - **Day 4 (3rd December 2025):** 
      - Apply 6 kg of 12-61-0 and 4.5 kg of Urea per acre.
      - Apply 11.5 kg of 24-24-0 and 1.5 kg of Phosphoric Acid per acre.
- **Watering Condition:** 
  - Soil Moisture: 17 kPa (below optimal of 18 kPa)
  - **Watering not required as of now.**

**SHESH PLOT:**
- **Active Stage:** Vegetative Growth (Started on 24th November 2025)
- **Fertigation Schedule:**
  - **Today (30th November 2025):**
    - **Day 1:** Apply 1 liter of Humic Acid per acre.
    - **Day 4 (3rd December 2025):** 
      - Apply 6 kg of 12-61-0 and 5.5 kg of Urea per acre.
      - Apply 16 kg of 24-24-0 per acre.
- **Watering Condition:** 
  - Soil Moisture: 62% (below optimal of 80%)
  - **Watering can be done.**

### Spray Conditions
- **TARAK Plot:** 
  - Ideal conditions for spraying from 11:30 AM to 6:30 PM today.
- **SHESH PLOT:** 
  - Ideal conditions for spraying from 9:30 AM to 6:30 PM today.

### Summary
Both plots are in the vegetative growth stage, with specific fertigation requirements. The SHESH PLOT requires watering, while the TARAK Plot does not. Ideal conditions for spraying are available throughout the day.

messages.content:
### બટાકાના પાકની હાલત

**TARAK Plot:**
- **સક્રિય તબક્કો:** વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (24 નવેમ્બર 2025થી શરૂ)
- **ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:**
  - **આજે (30 નવેમ્બર 2025):**
    - **દિવસ 1:** 1 લિટર હ્યુમિક એસિડ પ્રતિ એકર લાગુ કરો.
    - **દિવસ 4 (3 ડિસેમ્બર 2025):** 
      - 6 કિલોગ્રામ 12-61-0 અને 4.5 કિલોગ્રામ યુરિયા પ્રતિ એકર લાગુ કરો.
      - 11.5 કિલોગ્રામ 24-24-0 અને 1.5 કિલોગ્રામ ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ પ્રતિ એકર લાગુ કરો.
- **પાણી આપવાની સ્થિતિ:** 
  - મીઠી જમીન: 17 kPa (આપણે 18 kPaની જરૂર છે)
  - **હવે પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી.**

**SHESH PLOT:**
- **સક્રિય તબક્કો:** વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (24 નવેમ્બર 2025થી શરૂ)
- **ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:**
  - **આજે (30 નવેમ્બર 2025):**
    - **દિવસ 1:** 1 લિટર હ્યુમિક એસિડ પ્રતિ એકર લાગુ કરો.
    - **દિવસ 4 (3 ડિસેમ્બર 2025):** 
      - 6 કિલોગ્રામ 12-61-0 અને 5.5 કિલોગ્રામ યુરિયા પ્રતિ એકર લાગુ કરો.
      - 16 કિલોગ્રામ 24-24-0 પ્રતિ એકર લાગુ કરો.
- **પાણી આપવાની સ્થિતિ:** 
  - મીઠી જમીન: 62% (આપણે 80%ની જરૂર છે)
  - **પાણી આપવું જોઈએ.**

### સ્પ્રેની સ્થિતિ
- **TARAK Plot:** 
  - આજે 11:30 AM થી 6:30 PM સુધી સ્પ્રે માટે યોગ્ય સ્થિતિ છે.
- **SHESH PLOT:** 
  - આજે 9:30 AM થી 6:30 PM સુધી સ્પ્રે માટે યોગ્ય સ્થિતિ છે.

### સારાંશ
બન્ને પ્લોટ વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ તબક્કામાં છે, જેમાં ખાસ ફર્ટિગેશનની જરૂરિયાત છે. SHESH PLOTને પાણી આપવાની જરૂર છે, જ્યારે TARAK Plotને હવે પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી. સ્પ્રે માટેની યોગ્ય સ્થિતિ આખા દિવસ માટે ઉપલબ્ધ છે.
messages.en:
### Status of potato crop

**TARAK Plot:**
- **Active Phase:** Negative Growth (Starting November 24, 2025)
- **Fertigation Schedule:**
  - **Today (30 November 2025):**
    - **Day 1:** Apply 1 liter of humic acid per acre.
    - **Day 4 (3 December 2025):** 
      - Apply 6 kg 12-61-0 and 4.5 kg urea per acre.
      - Apply 11.5 kg 24-24-0 and 1.5 kg phosphoric acid per acre.
- **Watering Condition:** 
  - Sweet soil: 17 kPa (we need 18 kPa)
  - **No more watering.**

**SHESH PLOT:**
- **Active Phase:** Negative Growth (Starting November 24, 2025)
- **Fertigation Schedule:**
  - **Today (30 November 2025):**
    - **Day 1:** Apply 1 liter of humic acid per acre.
    - **Day 4 (3 December 2025):** 
      - Apply 6 kg 12-61-0 and 5.5 kg urea per acre.
      - Apply 16 kg 24-24-0 per acre.
- **Watering Condition:** 
  - Freshland: 62% (we need 80%)
  - **Should be watered.**

### Spray Status
- **TARAK Plot:** 
  - The ideal conditions for spraying are from 11:30 AM to 6:30 PM today.
- **SHESH PLOT:** 
  - The ideal conditions for spraying are from 9:30 AM to 6:30 PM today.

### Summary
Both plots are in the vegetative growth stage, requiring special fertigation. SHESH PLOT needs to be watered, while TARAK Plot does not need to be watered anymore. The right position for the spray is available for the whole day.

messages.content: પાણી કયારે આપી શકીએ પ્લોટ 2 માં
messages.en: When can we give water to Plot 2?
messages.standalone_question: When can we provide water to plot 2?
messages.content_transliterated: pani kayre aapi shakie plot 2 man

messages.content:
પ્લોટ 2 માં પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી, કારણ કે:

- જમીનનું આલમ (soil moisture) 89% છે.
- જમીનનું બીજું આલમ 88% છે.
- આલમના આદર્શ સ્તર 55% છે.

જમીનનું આલમ આદર્શ સ્તરથી વધુ છે, તેથી હાલ પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી.
messages.en:
There is no need to water in plot 2 because:

- Soil moisture is 89%.
- The second part of the land is 88%.
- The ideal level of Alam is 55%.

The soil cover is above the ideal level, so there is no need to water at present.
messages.content_transliterated:
plot 2 man pani apavani jarur nathi, karan ke:

- jaminanun alam (soil moisture) 89% che.
- jaminanun biju alam 88% che.
- alamana adarsh star 55% che.

jaminanun alam adarsh starathi vadhu che, tethi hal pani apavani jarur nathi.

messages.content:
પ્લોટ 2 માં પાણી આપવાની યોગ્ય સ્થિતિ 55% (શુષ્ક) ની નીચે છે.

When the soil is below 55%, water should be given.

messages.content: द्राक्ष
messages.en: Grapes
messages.standalone_question: What is the expected drop rate for grapes?
messages.content_transliterated: draksh

messages.content:
द्राक्षांच्या गळण्याच्या अवस्थेत, गळण्याचे प्रमाण विविध घटकांवर अवलंबून असते, जसे की पाण्याची उपलब्धता, पोषण, तापमान, आणि रोगांचा प्रभाव. सामान्यतः, गळण्याच्या अवस्थेत 10% ते 30% पर्यंत गळण्याची शक्यता असते.

तुमच्या द्राक्षांच्या पिकासाठी योग्य व्यवस्थापन आणि काळजी घेणे महत्त्वाचे आहे, जेणेकरून गळण्याचे प्रमाण कमी करता येईल. जर तुम्हाला अधिक विशिष्ट माहिती हवी असेल, तर कृपया अधिक तपशील द्या.
messages.en:
In the grape fall stage, the extent of the drop depends on various factors, such as water availability, nutrition, temperature, and the impact of diseases. Typically, there is a 10% to 30% chance of leaking during the leak stage.

It is important to take proper management and care for your grape crop, so that the rate of shedding can be minimized. If you would like more specific information, please provide more details.
messages.content_transliterated:
draksanchya galanyachya avasthet, galanyache praman vividh ghatakanvar avalambun asate, jase key panyachi upalabdhata, poshan, tapaman, ani rogancha prabhav. samanyatah, galanyachya avasthet 10% te 30% paryant galanyachi shakyata asate.

tumachya draksanchya pikasathi yogy vyavasthapan ani kalaji ghene mahattvache aahe, jenekarun galanyache praman kami karata yeil. jar tumhala adhik vishist mahiti havi asel, tar kripaya adhik tapashil dya.

messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mara pak mate kayu khatar vaparvu?

messages.content:
તમારા પાક માટે, જે હાલની સ્થિતિમાં "Vegetative growth" (વૃદ્ધિ) છે, 4મી સપ્તાહમાં નીચેના ખાતરોનો ઉપયોગ કરવાની ભલામણ કરવામાં આવે છે:

### હાલની ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:
- **ફોલિયર પદ્ધતિ દ્વારા:**
  - **ઝિંક સલ્ફેટ:** 600 ગ્રામ/એકર
  - **ફેરસ સલ્ફેટ:** 600 ગ્રામ/એકર
  - **મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ:** 1.2 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

### નોંધ:
- ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે માટે માઇક્રો-ન્યુટ્રિયન્ટ ખાતરોની સંકેતિત સંકલન 1% થી વધુ ન હોવું જોઈએ, જેમ કે 500 લિટર પાણીમાં 5 કિલોગ્રામ.

### આગામી ફર્ટિગેશન:
- **ફૂલણ (Flowering) માટે:**
  - **માટીમાં લાગુ કરવાની પદ્ધતિ:**
    - **એમોનિયમ સલ્ફેટ:** 43 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
    - **પોટાશના સલ્ફેટ:** 32 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

- **ફોલિયર પદ્ધતિ દ્વારા:**
  - **સોલુબોર:** 800 ગ્રામ/એકર

આ માહિતીનો ઉપયોગ કરીને, તમે તમારા પાક માટે યોગ્ય ખાતર પસંદ કરી શકો છો.
messages.en:
For your crop, which is "vegetative growth" in its current state, it is recommended to use the following fertilizers in the 4th week:

### Current fertigation schedule:
- **By foliar method:**
  - **Zinc sulphate:** 600 g/acre
  - **Ferrous sulphate:** 600 g/acre
  - **Magnesium sulfate:** 1.2 kg/acre

### Note:
- The indicated combination of micro-nutrient fertilizers for foliar spray should not exceed 1%, i.e. 5 kg in 500 litres of water.

### Next Fertigation:
- **For Flowering:**
  - **Method of application in soil:**
    - **Ammonium Sulphate:** 43 kg/acre
    **Potash sulphate:** 32 kg/acre

- **By foliar method:**
  - **Solubor:** 800 g/acre

Using this information, you can choose the right fertilizer for your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tamara pak mate, jay halani sthitiman "Vegetative growth" (vriddhi) che, 4me saptahaman nicena khatarono upayog karvani bhalaman karavaman ave che:

### halani fertigation schedule:
- **follier paddhati dvara:**
  - **jhink sulfate:** 600 gram/acre
  - **ferrous sulfate:** 600 gram/acre
  - **magnesium sulfate:** 1.2 kilogram/acre

### nondh:
- follier spray mate micro-nyutriyant khataroni sanketit sankalan 1% thi vadhu n hovun joie, jem ke 500 litre paniman 5 kilogram.

### agami fertigation:
- **phulan (Flowering) mate:**
  - **matiman lagu karvani paddhati:**
    - **ammonium sulfate:** 43 kilogram/acre
    - **potashana sulfate:** 32 kilogram/acre

- **follier paddhati dvara:**
  - **solubor:** 800 gram/acre

a mahitino upayog karine, tame tamara pak mate yogy khatar pasand kari shako cho.

messages.content: મારા ખેતર મા પાણી કયારે જરૂર છે
messages.en: When does my field need water?
messages.standalone_question: When does my farm need irrigation?
messages.content_transliterated: mara khetar ma pani kayre jarur che

messages.content:
### Main Palot 971 માટે પાણીની જરૂરત:

- **હાલની જમીનની ભેજ:**
  - **સંવેદક 1:** 19 kPa (થોડી સૂકી)
  - **સંવેદક 2:** 21 kPa (થોડી વધુ સૂકી)

- **લક્ષ્ય જમીન ભેજ:** 15 kPa

### પાણી આપવાની ભલામણ:
- **આજ (30 નવેમ્બર 2025) ના રોજ પાણી આપવું જોઈએ.**

જો વરસાદની અપેક્ષા ન હોય, તો આજે પાણી આપવું યોગ્ય રહેશે.
messages.en:
### Water Requirement for Main Palot 971:

- **Current soil moisture:**
  - **Sensor 1:** 19 kPa (slightly dry)
  - **Sensor 2:** 21 kPa (slightly drier)

- **Target soil humidity:** 15 kPa

### Recommendation for watering:
- **Water should be given today (30 November 2025).**

If rain is not expected, it will be advisable to water today.
messages.content_transliterated:
### Main Palot 971 mate panini jarurat:

- **halani jaminani bhej:**
  - **sanvedak 1:** 19 kPa (thodi suki)
  - **sanvedak 2:** 21 kPa (thodi vadhu suki)

- **lakshya jamin bhej:** 15 kPa

### pani apavani bhalaman:
- **aaj (30 november 2025) na rose pani apvu joie.**

jo varsadni apeksha n hoy, to aje pani apvu yogy rehse.

initial_message: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
आपल्या पिकासाठी खत वापरण्याची शेड्यूल खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

### Plot No 1 Thompson (फळ सेट स्टेज)
- **सध्याची स्टेज:** फळ सेट (Fruit Set)
- **सध्याचा आठवडा:** 1

#### फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल:
1. **फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:**
   - **11-44-11:** 6.5 किग्रॅ/एकर
   - **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट:** 3 किग्रॅ/एकर
   - **साल्फेट ऑफ पोटाश:** 3.5 किग्रॅ/एकर
   - **मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट:** 1.5 किग्रॅ/एकर

2. **फोलिअर पद्धतीने:**
   - **फेरस सल्फेट:** 600 ग्रॅम/एकर
   - **मॅंगनीज सल्फेट:** 600 ग्रॅम/एकर

### Plot No 2 Thompson (कॅन थिनिंग स्टेज)
- **सध्याची स्टेज:** कॅन थिनिंग (Cane thinning)
- **सध्याचा आठवडा:** 31

#### फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल:
- **सध्या फर्टिगेशनची आवश्यकता नाही.**
- **उपकंपन स्टेज:** सबकॅन (Subcane)
  - **फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:**
    - **मोनो पोटॅशियम फॉस्फेट:** 3.5 किग्रॅ/एकर
    - **फॉस्फोरिक अॅसिड 80%:** 5 किग्रॅ/एकर

आपल्या पिकाच्या स्टेजनुसार योग्य खतांचा वापर करणे महत्त्वाचे आहे. जर तुम्हाला अधिक माहिती हवी असेल तर कृपया सांगा!
messages.en:
The schedule for using fertilizer for your crop is as follows:

### Plot No 1 Thompson (Fruit Set Stage)
- **Current Stage:** Fruit Set
- **Current Week:** 1

#### Fertigation Schedule:
1. **Fertigation Method:**
   - **11-44-11:** 6.5 kg/acre
   - **Calcium nitrate:** 3 kg/acre
   - **Sulphate of Potash:** 3.5 kg/acre
   - **Magnesium Sulfate:** 1.5 kg/acre

2. **Foliar Method:**
   - **Ferrous sulfate:** 600 g/acre
   - **Manganese sulfate:** 600 g/acre

### Plot No 2 Thompson (Can Thinking Stage)
- **Current Stage:** Cane thinning
- **Current Week:** 31

#### Fertigation Schedule:
- **No need for fertigation at present.**
- **Subcane Stage:** Subcane
  - **Fertigation Method:**
    - **Mono Potassium Phosphate:** 3.5 kg/acre
    - **Phosphoric acid 80%:** 5 kg/acre

It's important to use the right fertilizers depending on the stage of your crop. If you would like more information, please let us know!
messages.content_transliterated:
apalya pikasathi khat vaparanyachi schedule khaleelapramane aahe:

### Plot No 1 Thompson (full set stage)
- **sadhyachi stage:** fal set (Fruit Set)
- **sadhyacha athavada:** 1

#### fertigation schedule:
1. **fertigation paddhatine:**
   - **11-44-11:** 6.5 kigra/acre
   - **calcium nitrate:** 3 kigra/acre
   - **salfette of potash:** 3.5 kigra/acre
   - **magnesium sulfate:** 1.5 kigra/acre

2. **follier paddhatine:**
   - **ferrous sulphate:** 600 gram/acre
   - **manganese sulfate:** 600 gram/acre

### Plot No 2 Thompson (kan thinning stage)
- **sadhyachi stage:** can thinning (Cane thinning)
- **sadhyacha athavada:** 31

#### fertigation schedule:
- **sadhya fertigationchy aavashyakta nahi.**
- **upakampan stage:** subcan (Subcane)
  - **fertigation paddhatine:**
    - **mono potassium phosphate:** 3.5 kigra/acre
    - **phosphoric acid 80%:** 5 kigra/acre

apalya pikachya stejanusar yogya khatancha vapar karne mahatvache aahe. jar tumhala adhik mahiti havi asel tar kripya sanga!

initial_message: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकाला पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. 

### पाण्याची स्थिती:
- **Plot no 1 Ssn**: 
  - सध्या मातीची आर्द्रता: 0 kPa (खूप ओलसर)
  - आदर्श आर्द्रता: 32 kPa
  - पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही.
  
- **Plot no 2 Thompson**: 
  - सध्या मातीची आर्द्रता: 0 kPa (खूप ओलसर)
  - आदर्श आर्द्रता: 25 kPa
  - पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही.

### फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल:
- **Plot no 1 Ssn**:
  - सध्या: "Beginning of Bloom" (Bloom चा प्रारंभ) - 2 आठवडे
  - पुढील शेड्यूल: "Fruit Set" (फळ सेट) - 1 आठवडा (12 डिसेंबर 2025 पासून)
  
- **Plot no 2 Thompson**:
  - सध्या: "Shoot Development" (शूट विकास) - 3 आठवडे
  - पुढील शेड्यूल: "Beginning of Bloom" (Bloom चा प्रारंभ) - 1 आठवडा (10 डिसेंबर 2025 पासून)

### शेतकऱ्याच्या क्रियाकलापांची माहिती:
- सध्या कोणतेही शेतकऱ्याचे क्रियाकलाप नाहीत.

### स्प्रे स्थिती:
- स्प्रे करण्याच्या स्थितीची माहिती मिळवता आलेली नाही.

तुम्हाला आणखी काही माहिती हवी असल्यास, कृपया सांगा!
messages.en:
Your crop does not need to be watered. 

### Water Conditions:
- **Plot no 1 Ssn**: 
  - Current soil moisture: 0 kPa (very moist)
  - Ideal humidity: 32 kPa
  - No watering is required.
  
- **Plot no 2 Thompson**: 
  - Current soil moisture: 0 kPa (very moist)
  - Ideal humidity: 25 kPa
  - No watering is required.

### Fertigation Schedule:
- **Plot no 1 Ssn**:
  - Current: "Beginning of Bloom" - 2 weeks
  - Next Schedule: "Fruit Set" - 1 week (from December 12, 2025)
  
- **Plot no 2 Thompson**:
  - Currently: "Shoot Development" - 3 weeks
  - Next Schedule: "Beginning of Bloom" – 1 week (from December 10, 2025)

### Information on Farmer Activities:
- At present there are no farmer activities.

### Spray Status:
- The status of spraying could not be obtained.

If you would like any more information, please let us know!
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya picala pani denyachi aavashyakta nahi. 

### panyachi sthiti:
- **Plot no 1 Ssn**: 
  - sadhya matichi aardrata: 0 kPa (khoop olsar)
  - adarsh aardrata: 32 kPa
  - paani denyachi aavashyakta nahi.
  
- **Plot no 2 Thompson**: 
  - sadhya matichi aardrata: 0 kPa (khoop olsar)
  - adarsh aardrata: 25 kPa
  - paani denyachi aavashyakta nahi.

### fertigation schedule:
- **Plot no 1 Ssn**:
  - sadhya: "Beginning of Bloom" (Bloom cha prarambh) - 2 athavade
  - pudhil schedule: "Fruit Set" (full set) - 1 athavada (12 december 2025 pasun)
  
- **Plot no 2 Thompson**:
  - sadhya: "Shoot Development" (shoot vikas) - 3 athavade
  - pudhil schedule: "Beginning of Bloom" (Bloom cha prarambh) - 1 athavada (10 december 2025 pasun)

### shetakaryachya kriyakalapanchi mahiti:
- sadhya kontehi shetkaryache kriyakalap nahit.

### spray sthiti:
- spray karanyachya sthitichi mahiti milavata aleli nahi.

tumhala aankhi kahi mahiti havi asalyas, krupaya sanga!

initial_message: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकासाठी (द्राक्षे) खालील खतांचा वापर करावा:

### सध्याचा फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (सुरुवात बूमिंग स्टेज - 1वी आठवडा)
- **फर्टिलायझर**:
  1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 3.5 kg/एकर
  2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 1.5 kg/एकर (इतर खतांच्या वापरापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे)

### पुढील फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (सुरुवात बूमिंग स्टेज - 2री आठवडा)
- **फर्टिलायझर**:
  1. **11-44-11** - 6.5 kg/एकर
  2. **Calcium nitrate** - 3 kg/एकर (इतर खतांच्या वापरानंतर 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे)
  3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3.5 kg/एकर

या शेड्यूलनुसार खतांचा वापर करून तुमच्या द्राक्षांच्या पिकाची वाढ उत्तम होईल.
messages.en:
The following fertilizers should be used for your crop (grapes):

### Current Fertigation Schedule (Beginning Booming Stage - 1st Week)
- **Fertilizer**:
  1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 3.5 kg/acre
  2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 1.5 kg/acre (to be applied separately for 15-20 minutes before use of other fertilizers)

### Next Fertigation Schedule (Beginning Booming Stage - 2nd Week)
- **Fertilizer**:
  1. **11-44-11** - 6.5 kg/acre
  2. **Calcium nitrate** - 3 kg/acre (apply separately for 15-20 minutes after use of other fertilizers)
  3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3.5 kg/acre

According to this schedule, the use of fertilizers will help your grape crop grow better.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya pikasathi (drakshe) khalil khatancha vapar karava:

### sadhyacha fertigation schedule (suruvat booming stage - 1v athavada)
- **fertilizer**:
  1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 3.5 kg/acre
  2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 1.5 kg/acre (itar khatanchya vaparapurvi 15-20 minite vegale lagoo karave)

### pudhil fertigation schedule (suruvat booming stage - 2re athavada)
- **fertilizer**:
  1. **11-44-11** - 6.5 kg/acre
  2. **Calcium nitrate** - 3 kg/acre (itar khatanchya vaparanantar 15-20 minite vegale lagoo karave)
  3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3.5 kg/acre

ya shedulanusar khatancha vapar karun tumachya drakshanchya picacci vadh uttam hoil.

messages.content:
It seems that the recharge information for your plots is not available, so I cannot provide the current soil moisture readings. However, here are the optimal soil moisture ranges for your plots:

1. **Durai's plot (1st plot)**:
   - Optimal soil moisture: 0 kPa (wet) - 15 kPa (dry). Irrigate if the moisture is above 15 kPa.

2. **Durai's plot (2nd plot)**:
   - Optimal soil moisture: 0 kPa (wet) - 18 kPa (dry). Irrigate if the moisture is above 18 kPa.

Please recharge your plot to get the latest data and determine if irrigation is needed.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "थॉमसन प्लॉट नं 1" वर सध्या पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. 

- **मातीची आर्द्रता**: 
  - 67% (पहिला सेंसर)
  - 82% (दुसरा सेंसर)
  
- **आवश्यक आर्द्रता**: 60%

सध्या मातीची आर्द्रता आवश्यकतेपेक्षा जास्त आहे, त्यामुळे पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही.

- **Soil Moisture**:

- **Required humidity**: 60%

At present, soil moisture is more than required, so there is no need to water.

sadhya matichi ardrata avashyakatepeksa jast aahe, tyamule pani denyachi avashyakata nahi.

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकांसाठी पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. 

1. **Clone 2A Plot**: 
   - मातीतील आर्द्रता: 100% (पहिला सेंसर), 99% (दुसरा सेंसर)
   - आदर्श आर्द्रता: 60%
   - पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही, कारण आर्द्रता आदर्श किमतींपेक्षा जास्त आहे.

2. **Thompson Plot**: 
   - मातीतील आर्द्रता: 13 kPa (पहिला सेंसर), 9 kPa (दुसरा सेंसर)
   - आदर्श आर्द्रता: 32 kPa
   - पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही, कारण आर्द्रता आदर्श किमतींपेक्षा कमी आहे.

तुमच्या पिकांना सध्या पाण्याची आवश्यकता नाही.
messages.en:
There is no need to water your crops. 

1. **Clone 2A Plot**: 
   - Soil humidity: 100% (first sensor), 99% (second sensor)
   - Ideal humidity: 60%
   - No need to water, as the humidity is higher than the ideal values.

2. **Thompson Plot**: 
   - Soil humidity: 13 kPa (first sensor), 9 kPa (second sensor)
   - Ideal humidity: 32 kPa
   - No need to water, as the humidity is lower than the ideal values.

Your crops don't need water right now.

   - paani denyachi aavashyakta nahi, karan aardrata adarsh kimateempeksha jast ahe.

2. **Thompson Plot**:

   - adarsh aardrata: 32 kPa
   - paani denyachi aavashyakta nahi, karan aardrata adarsh kimateempeksha kami aahe.

messages.content: माझ्या थॉमसन प्लॉटला भुरीचे औषध देऊ का एखादा औषध देऊ का
messages.en: Should I give my Thomson plot a medicine or a medicine
messages.standalone_question: Should I apply a treatment for powdery mildew on my Thompson plot?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya thomson plotala bhuriche ausadh deu ka ekhada ausadh deu ka

messages.content:
तुमच्या थॉमसन प्लॉटसाठी भुरीच्या औषधाची आवश्यकता आहे. 

1. **स्प्रे शेड्यूल**: सध्या कोणतीही औषधाची शिफारस नाही.
2. **कृषी क्रियाकलाप**: सध्या कोणतेही कृषी क्रियाकलाप केलेले नाहीत.
3. **स्प्रे परिस्थिती**: आजच्या दिवशी (30 नोव्हेंबर 2025) सर्व तासांमध्ये स्प्रे करण्यासाठी परिस्थिती "IDEAL" आहे.

तुम्ही भुरीसाठी औषध देऊ शकता, कारण परिस्थिती उत्तम आहे.
messages.en:
Your Thomson plot needs a potion. 

1. **Spray Schedule**: There is currently no medication recommendation.
2. **Agricultural Activities**: No agricultural activities have been carried out at present.
3. **Spray Conditions**: Conditions are "IDEAL" for spraying at all hours on this day (November 30, 2025).

You can give medicine for Bhuri, because the situation is good.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya thomson plotsathi bhurichya ausadhachi avashyakata aahe. 

1. **spray schedule**: sadhya konatihi ausadhachi shipharas nahi.
2. **krishi kriyakalap**: sadhya konatehi krishi kriyakalap kelele nahit.
3. **spray paristhiti**: ajachya divashi (30 november 2025) serve tasanmadhye spray karanyasathi paristhiti "IDEAL" aahe.

tumhi bhurisathi ausadh deu shakata, karan paristhiti uttam aahe.

messages.content: बुरी आहे का आहे का विचारतोय
messages.en: I'm asking if it's bad.
messages.standalone_question: Is there a fungal infection present?

messages.content:
तुमच्या थॉमसन प्लॉटमध्ये भुरी (Powdery Mildew) चा धोका उच्च आहे. 

- **भुरीचे अंदाज**:
  - 30 नोव्हेंबर 2025: 87.2% (उच्च धोका)
  - 29 नोव्हेंबर 2025: 88.2% (उच्च धोका)
  - 28 नोव्हेंबर 2025: 86.7% (उच्च धोका)
  - 27 नोव्हेंबर 2025: 82.5% (उच्च धोका)
  - 26 नोव्हेंबर 2025: 84.4% (उच्च धोका)

तुमच्या प्लॉटमध्ये भुरीचा धोका उच्च असल्याने, तुम्हाला भुरीसाठी औषध देणे आवश्यक आहे.
messages.en:
The risk of powdery mildew is high in your Thomson plot. 

- **Bad Predictions**:
  - 30 November 2025: 87.2% (high risk)
  - 29 November 2025: 88.2% (high risk)
  - 28 November 2025: 86.7% (high risk)
  - 27 November 2025: 82.5% (high risk)
  - 26 November 2025: 84.4% (high risk)

Since the risk of browning is high in your plot, you need to give medicine for the brown.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya thomson plautmadhye bhuri (Powdery Mildew) cha dhoka uchch aahe. 

- **bhuriche andaj**:
  - 30 november 2025: 87.2% (uchch dhoka)
  - 29 november 2025: 88.2% (uchch dhoka)
  - 28 november 2025: 86.7% (uchch dhoka)
  - 27 november 2025: 82.5% (uchch dhoka)
  - 26 november 2025: 84.4% (uchch dhoka)

tumachya plautmadhye bhuricha dhoka uchch asalyane, tumhala bhurisathi ausadh dene avashyak aahe.

messages.content: औषध कुठले देऊन द्या हे सांगता का
messages.en: Can you tell me which medicine to give
messages.standalone_question: Which medication should I apply for powdery mildew?
messages.content_transliterated: ausadh kuthale deun dya he sangata ka

messages.content:
सध्या थॉमसन प्लॉटसाठी भुरीवर औषध देण्याची कोणतीही शिफारस नाही. 

तुम्ही भुरीसाठी सामान्यतः वापरले जाणारे औषध म्हणजे **बायोफंगस** किंवा **फंगिसाइड** जसे की **डायफेनकोझोल** किंवा **बोर्डो मिश्रण**. 

तुम्ही या औषधांचा वापर करू शकता, परंतु कृपया स्थानिक कृषी तज्ञांचा सल्ला घेणे चांगले आहे.
messages.en:
Currently, there is no recommendation for the Thomson Plot. 

The most commonly used medication for your brown is **biofungi** or **fungicides** such as **difencozole** or **Bordeaux mixture**. 

You can use these medicines, but it is better to please consult a local agricultural expert.
messages.content_transliterated:
sadhya thomson plotsathi bhurivar ausadh denyachi konatihi shipharas nahi. 

tumhi bhurisathi samanyatah vaparale janare ausadh mhanaje **biofungus** kinva **fungiside** jase key **dyfencozole** kinva **bordo mishran**. 

tumhi ya ausadhancha vapar karu shakata, parantu kripaya sthanik krishi tajnancha salla ghene changale aahe.

activeStage.message: You are above 112 days from estimated stage end of stage Topping, please update your stage on the app

initial_message: मामा जंबूला कोणते पोषण द्रव्य देऊ

messages.content: मामा जंबूला कोणते पोषण द्रव्य देऊ
messages.en: What nourishment should you give to Mama Jambu?
messages.standalone_question: What nutrients should be provided to Mama Jumbo?
messages.content_transliterated: mama jambula conte posan dravy deu

messages.content:
मामा जंबूच्या "फ्रूट सेट" अवस्थेत (सुरुवात तारीख: 27 नोव्हेंबर 2025) तुम्हाला खालील पोषण द्रव्ये देणे आवश्यक आहे:

### फोलिअर पद्धतीने:
- **फेरस सल्फेट**: 600 ग्रॅम/एकर
- **मॅंगनीज सल्फेट**: 600 ग्रॅम/एकर

> **टीप**: फोलिअर स्प्रेमध्ये सूक्ष्म पोषण द्रव्यांची एकाग्रता 1% पेक्षा जास्त नसावी, म्हणजेच 500 लिटर पाण्यात 5 किलो.

### फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:
- **11-44-11**: 6.5 किलो/एकर
- **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट**: 3 किलो/एकर
- **सल्फेट ऑफ पोटाश**: 3.5 किलो/एकर
- **मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट**: 1.5 किलो/एकर

> **टीप**: फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल वेगळा लागू करावा, इतर खतांच्या अनुप्रयोगाच्या 15-20 मिनिटे आधी.

तुमच्या पुढील अवस्थेत (बेर्री डेव्हलपमेंट) 11 डिसेंबर 2025 पासून फर्टिगेशनची आवश्यकता असेल.
messages.en:
In the "fruit set" stage of Mama Jambu (start date: November 27, 2025) you need to be given the following nutrients:

### Foliar Method:
- **Ferrous sulfate**: 600 g/acre
- **Manganese sulfate**: 600 g/acre

> **Note**: The concentration of micronutrients in foliar spray should not exceed 1%, i.e. 5 kg in 500 liters of water.

### Fertigation Method:
- **11-44-11**: 6.5 kg/acre
- **Calcium Nitrate**: 3 kg/acre
- **Sulphate of Potash**: 3.5 kg/acre
- **Magnesium Sulfate**: 1.5 kg/acre

> **Note**: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately, 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.

In your next stage (berry development), fertigation will be required from December 11, 2025.
messages.content_transliterated:
mama jambuchya "fruit set" avasthet (suruvat tarikh: 27 november 2025) tumhala khalil posan dravye dene avashyak aahe:

### foliar paddhatine:
- **ferrous sulphate**: 600 gram/acre
- **manganese sulphate**: 600 gram/acre

> **tip**: foliar spremadhye suksm posan dravyanchi ekagrata 1% peksa jast nasavi, mhanajech 500 litre panyat 5 kilo.

### fertigation paddhatine:
- **11-44-11**: 6.5 kilo/acre
- **calcium nitrate**: 3 kilo/acre
- **sulphate of potash**: 3.5 kilo/acre
- **magnesium sulphate**: 1.5 kilo/acre

> **tip**: phosphoric aml vegala lagu karava, itar khatanchya anuprayogachya 15-20 minute aadhi.

tumachya pudhil avasthet (berry development) 11 december 2025 pasun fertigationchi avashyakata asel.

initial_message: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकासाठी (द्राक्षे) खालील खतांचा वापर करावा:

### सध्या (आठवडा 3) 
**पिकाचा टप्पा:** बेरी विकास (Berry Development)  
**खतांचा वापर:**  
1. **13-40-13** - 3 किलोग्राम/एकर  
2. **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट** - 6.5 किलोग्राम/एकर  
3. **साल्फेट ऑफ पोटाश** - 6.5 किलोग्राम/एकर  
4. **मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट** - 2.5 किलोग्राम/एकर  

**विशेष सूचना:**  
- फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल (Phosphoric acid) 15-20 मिनिटे आधी लागू करावे.  
- कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट 15-20 मिनिटे नंतर लागू करावे.  

### पुढील (आठवडा 4) 
**पिकाचा टप्पा:** बेरी विकास (Berry Development)  
**खतांचा वापर:**  
1. **13-40-13** - 3 किलोग्राम/एकर  
2. **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट** - 6.5 किलोग्राम/एकर  
3. **साल्फेट ऑफ पोटाश** - 6.5 किलोग्राम/एकर  
4. **मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट** - 2.5 किलोग्राम/एकर  

या खतांचा वापर तुमच्या पिकाच्या विकासासाठी उपयुक्त ठरेल.
messages.en:
The following fertilizers should be used for your crop (grapes):

### Right Now (Week 3) 
**Crop Stage:** Berry Development  
**Use of Fertilizers:**  
1. **13-40-13** - 3kg/acre  
2. **Calcium Nitrate** - 6.5 kg/acre  
3. **Sulphate of Potash** - 6.5 kg/acre  
4. **Magnesium Sulphate** - 2.5 kg/acre  

**Special Notice:**  
- Apply phosphoric acid 15-20 minutes beforehand.  
Calcium nitrate should be applied after 15-20 minutes.  

### Next (Week 4) 
**Crop Stage:** Berry Development  
**Use of Fertilizers:**  
1. **13-40-13** - 3kg/acre  
2. **Calcium Nitrate** - 6.5 kg/acre  
3. **Sulphate of Potash** - 6.5 kg/acre  
4. **Magnesium Sulphate** - 2.5 kg/acre  

The use of these fertilizers will be helpful for the development of your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya pikasathi (drakshe) khalil khatancha vapar karava:

### sadhya (athavada 3) 
**picacha tappa:** berry vikas (Berry Development)  
**khatancha vapar:**  
1. **13-40-13** - 3 kilogram/acre  
2. **calcium nitrate** - 6.5 kilogram/acre  
3. **salfette of potash** - 6.5 kilogram/acre  
4. **magnesium sulfate** - 2.5 kilograms/acre  

**vishesh suchana:**  
- phosphoric omle (Phosphoric acid) 15-20 minite aadhi lagoo karave.  
- calcium nitrate 15-20 minite nantar lagoo karave.  

### pudhil (athavada 4) 
**picacha tappa:** berry vikas (Berry Development)  
**khatancha vapar:**  
1. **13-40-13** - 3 kilogram/acre  
2. **calcium nitrate** - 6.5 kilogram/acre  
3. **salfette of potash** - 6.5 kilogram/acre  
4. **magnesium sulfate** - 2.5 kilograms/acre  

ya khatancha vapar tumachya pikachya vikasasathi upayukt tharel.

initial_message: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "Thompson" द्राक्षांच्या पिकासाठी, सध्या तुम्ही "Beginning of Bloom" (फुलांचा प्रारंभ) या टप्प्यात आहात. या टप्प्यात, तुम्हाला खालील खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल:

### सध्याचा फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (सप्ताह 1):
1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 3.5 kg/acre
2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 1.5 kg/acre (हे इतर खतांच्या अनुप्रयोगापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे.)

### पुढील फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (सप्ताह 2):
1. **11-44-11** - 6.5 kg/acre
2. **Calcium nitrate** - 3 kg/acre (हे इतर खतांच्या अनुप्रयोगानंतर 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे.)
3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3.5 kg/acre

कृपया या शेड्यूलनुसार खतांचा वापर करा आणि तुमच्या पिकाच्या आरोग्यासाठी योग्य काळजी घ्या.
messages.en:
For your "Thompson" grape crop, you are currently in the "Beginning of Bloom" phase. During this step, you will need to use the following fertilizers:

### Current Fertigation Schedule (Week 1):
1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 3.5 kg/acre
2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 1.5 kg/acre (This should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.)

### Next Fertigation Schedule (Week 2):
1. **11-44-11** - 6.5 kg/acre
2. **Calcium nitrate** - 3 kg/acre (This should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes after application of other fertilizers.)
3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3.5 kg/acre

Please use fertilizers as per this schedule and take proper care for the health of your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "Thompson" drakshanchya pikasathi, sadhya tumhi "Beginning of Bloom" (phulancha prarambh) ya tappyat aahat. ya tappyat, tumhala khalil khatancha vapar karava lagel:

### sadhyacha fertigation schedule (saptah 1):
1. **Mono potassium phosphate** - 3.5 kg/acre
2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 1.5 kg/acre (hey itar khatanchya anuprayogapoorvee 15-20 minite swatantrapane lagoo karave.)

### pudhil fertigation schedule (saptah 2):
1. **11-44-11** - 6.5 kg/acre
2. **Calcium nitrate** - 3 kg/acre (hey itar khatanchya anuprayoganantar 15-20 minite swatantrapane lagoo karave.)
3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3.5 kg/acre

krupaya ya shedulanusar khatancha vapar kara aani tumchya pikachya arogyasathi yogya kalji ghya.

messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "SSN Plot no 1" वरील द्राक्षांच्या पिकासाठी, सध्या तुम्ही "Shoot Development" या टप्प्यात आहात, जो 2025-11-23 पासून सुरू झाला आहे. या टप्प्यातील 1 व्या आठवड्यात तुम्हाला खालील खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल:

### फोलिअर पद्धतीने:
- **Ferrous Sulphate**: 800 gm/acre
- **Manganese Sulphate**: 800 gm/acre

> **टीप**: फोलिअर स्प्रेमध्ये सूक्ष्म पोषण खतांची एकाग्रता 1% पेक्षा जास्त नसावी, म्हणजेच 500 लिटर पाण्यात 5 किलो खत.

### फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:
- **11-44-11**: 3 kg/acre
- **Calcium nitrate**: 6 kg/acre
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 1.5 kg/acre

**किंवा**

- **13-40-13**: 3 kg/acre
- **Calcium nitrate**: 5.5 kg/acre
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 1.5 kg/acre

**किंवा**

- **Calcium nitrate**: 8 kg/acre
- **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 2 kg/acre
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 2.5 kg/acre

### पुढील शेड्यूल:
तुमच्या पुढील आठवड्यात (2025-12-28) तुम्हाला "Zinc Oxide" आणि "Gibberallic acid (GA3)" यांचा वापर करावा लागेल.

तुमच्या पिकाच्या आरोग्यासाठी योग्य खतांचा वापर करणे महत्त्वाचे आहे.
messages.en:
For the grape crop on your "SSN Plot no 1", you are currently in the "Shoot Development" phase, which has started from 2025-11-23. In the 1st week of this phase, you may need to use the following fertilizers:

### Foliar Method:
- **Ferrous Sulphate**: 800 gm/acre
- **Manganese Sulphate**: 800 gm/acre

> **Note**: The concentration of micronutrient fertilizers in foliar spray should not exceed 1%, i.e. 5kg of fertilizer in 500 liters of water.

### Fertigation Method:
- **11-44-11**: 3 kg/acre
- **Calcium nitrate**: 6 kg/acre
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 1.5 kg/acre

**OR**

- **13-40-13**: 3 kg/acre
- **Calcium nitrate**: 5.5 kg/acre
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 1.5 kg/acre

**OR**

- **Calcium nitrate**: 8 kg/acre
- **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 2 kg/acre
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 2.5 kg/acre

### Next Schedule:
In your next week (2025-12-28) you will need to use "Zinc Oxide" and "Gibberallic acid (GA3)".

It is important to use the right fertilizers for the health of your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "SSN Plot no 1" varil drakshanchya pikasathi, sadhya tumhi "Shoot Development" ya tappyat aahat, joe 2025-11-23 pasun suru jhala aahe. ya tappyatil 1 vya aathvadyat tumhala khalil khatancha vapar karava lagel:

### follier paddhatine:
- **Ferrous Sulphate**: 800 gm/acre
- **Manganese Sulphate**: 800 gm/acre

> **tip**: follier spremadhye sukshm poshan khatanchi ekagrata 1% peksha jast nasavi, mhanjech 500 litre panyat 5 kilo khat.

### fertigation paddhatine:
- **11-44-11**: 3 kg/acre
- **Calcium nitrate**: 6 kg/acre
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 1.5 kg/acre

**kinva**

- **13-40-13**: 3 kg/acre
- **Calcium nitrate**: 5.5 kg/acre
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 1.5 kg/acre

**kinva**

- **Calcium nitrate**: 8 kg/acre
- **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 2 kg/acre
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 2.5 kg/acre

### pudhil schedule:
tumachya pudhil aathvadyat (2025-12-28) tumhala "Zinc Oxide" aani "Gibberallic acid (GA3)" yancha vapar karava lagel.

tumachya pikachya arogyasathi yogya khatancha vapar karne mahatvache aahe.

initial_message: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?

messages.content: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?
messages.en: Which fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mara pak mate kayu khatar vaparvu?

messages.content:
મને ખેદ છે, પરંતુ હું તમારા પાક માટે ખાતરનો ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ મેળવવામાં અસમર્થ છું. કૃપા કરીને થોડા સમય પછી ફરી પ્રયાસ કરો. 

જો તમને ખાતર વિશે વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ છે, તો હું મદદ કરી શકું છું.
messages.en:
I'm sorry, but I'm unable to get a fertilizer fertigation schedule for your crop. Please try again after some time. 

If you want more information about fertilizer, I can help.
messages.content_transliterated:
mane khed che, parantu hu tamara pak mate khatarano fertigation schedule melavavaman asamarth chu. krupa karine thoda samay pachi furry prayas karo. 

jo tamne khatar vishe vadhu mahiti joie che, to hu madad kari saku chu.

initial_message: અમારા પાકમાં દવાની કોઈ જરૂરિયાત ખરી

messages.content: અમારા પાકમાં દવાની કોઈ જરૂરિયાત ખરી
messages.en: Is there any need for medicine in our crops?
messages.standalone_question: Is there a need for any medication in our crops?
messages.content_transliterated: amara pakaman davani koi jaruriyat khari

messages.content:
આજે તમારા પાકમાં દવાની જરૂરિયાત નથી. 

1. **દવા છંટકાવની યોજના**: આજના દિવસે કોઈ દવા છંટકાવની જરૂરિયાત નથી.
2. **કૃષિ પ્રવૃત્તિઓ**: આજના દિવસે કોઈ કૃષિ પ્રવૃત્તિઓ નોંધાઈ નથી.
3. **છંટકાવની પરિસ્થિતિ**: આજે છંટકાવ માટેની પરિસ્થિતિ "IDEAL" છે, જેનો અર્થ છે કે છંટકાવ માટે આદર્શ પરિસ્થિતિ છે. 

જો તમે છંટકાવ કરવા માંગતા હો, તો તમે આજે 12:30 PM થી 2:30 PM સુધી અથવા 4:30 PM થી 6:30 PM સુધી છંટકાવ કરી શકો છો.
messages.en:
Today there is no need for pesticides in your crops. 

1. **Spray Plan**: No spraying is required on this day.
2. **AGRICULTURAL ACTIVITIES**: No agricultural activities have been reported as on date.
3. **Spray Situation**: The situation for spraying today is "IDEAL", which means that there is an ideal situation for spraying. 

If you want to spray, you can spray today from 12:30 PM to 2:30 PM or from 4:30 PM to 6:30 PM.
messages.content_transliterated:
aje tamara pakaman davani jaruriyat nathi. 

1. **dava chhantakavani yojana**: ajana divase koi dava chhantakavani jaruriyat nathi.
2. **krishi pravrittio**: ajana divase koi krishi pravrittio nondhai nathi.
3. **chhantakavani paristhiti**: aje chantakav mateni paristhiti "IDEAL" che, jeno earth che ke chantakav mate adarsh paristhiti che. 

jo tame chantakav karva mangata ho, to tame aje 12:30 PM thi 2:30 PM sudhi athava 4:30 PM thi 6:30 PM sudhi chantakav kari shako cho.

messages.content: પાકમાં નિંદામણનાશક દવા ક્યારે છાંટવાની
messages.en: When to spray herbicides in crops
messages.standalone_question: When should herbicides be sprayed on the crop?
messages.content_transliterated: pakaman nindamananashak dava kyare chantavani

messages.content:
તમારા પાકમાં નિંદામણનાશક દવા છંટકાવવાની જરૂરિયાત નથી, પરંતુ આજે છંટકાવ માટેની પરિસ્થિતિ "IDEAL" છે. 

**છંટકાવ માટેની શ્રેષ્ઠ સમયસૂચી:**
- **12:30 PM** થી **2:30 PM** સુધી
- **4:30 PM** થી **6:30 PM** સુધી

આ સમય દરમિયાન તમે નિંદામણનાશક દવા છંટકાવ કરી શકો છો.
messages.en:
There is no need to spray herbicides on your crops, but the situation for spraying today is "IDEAL". 

**Best schedule for spraying:**
- **12:30 PM** to **2:30 PM**
- **4:30 PM** to **6:30 PM**

You can spray herbicides during this time.
messages.content_transliterated:
tamara pakaman nindamananashak dava chhantakavavanee jaruriyat nathi, parantu aje chantakav mateni paristhiti "IDEAL" che. 

**chantakav mateni shreshth samayasuchi:**
- **12:30 PM** thi **2:30 PM** sudhi
- **4:30 PM** thi **6:30 PM** sudhi

a samay darmian tame nindamananashak dava chantakav kari shako cho.

initial_message: डाळिंब पिकाला पाणी बंद केले आहे परंतु अद्याप ताण बसत नाही काय करावे

messages.content: डाळिंब पिकाला पाणी बंद केले आहे परंतु अद्याप ताण बसत नाही काय करावे
messages.en: The pomegranate crop has been watered off but is still not stressed What to do
messages.standalone_question: What should I do if I have stopped watering my pomegranate crop but it is still not under stress?
messages.content_transliterated: dalimb pikala pani band kele aahe parantu adyap tan basat nahi kay karave

messages.content:
डाळिंब पिकाला पाणी बंद केले आहे आणि ताण बसत नाही, याचा अर्थ तुमच्या मातीतील आर्द्रता योग्य आहे. तुम्ही पाण्याची पातळी तपासण्यासाठी मातीतील आर्द्रता सेन्सरच्या वाचनाची तपासणी करू शकता. 

जर तुम्हाला अजूनही शंका असेल, तर तुम्ही सेन्सरच्या जवळ माती तपासू शकता. तुम्हाला आणखी काही मदतीची आवश्यकता असल्यास, तुम्ही तिकीट उघडण्याचा विचार करू शकता. 

तुमच्या पिकाच्या आर्द्रतेसाठी मी तुम्हाला आर्द्रता वाचन तपासून पाहण्याची शिफारस करतो.
messages.en:
The pomegranate crop is watered off and does not get stressed, which means that the moisture in your soil is right. You can check the reading of the soil moisture sensor to check the water level. 

If you are still in doubt, you can check the soil near the sensor. If you need any further help, you may want to consider opening a ticket. 

I recommend you check the humidity reading for the moisture content of your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
dalimb pikala pani band kele aahe ani tan basat nahi, yacha earth tumachya matitil ardrata yogy aahe. tumhi panyachi patali tapasanyasathi matitil ardrata sensarachya vachanachi tapasani karu shakata. 

jar tumhala ajunahi shanka asel, tar tumhi sensarachya javal mati tapasu shakata. tumhala anakhi kahi madatichi avashyakata asalyas, tumhi tikit ughadanyacha vichar karu shakata. 

tumachya pikachya ardratesathi me tumhala ardrata vachan tapasun pahanyachi shipharas karato.
