initial_message: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?

messages.content: माझ्या पिकाला पाणी द्यावे का?
messages.en: Should I water my crop?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikala pani dyave ka?

messages.content: तुमच्या पिकाला सध्या पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. "मनिकचमन" प्लॉटमध्ये मातीची आर्द्रता 10 kPa आणि 6 kPa आहे, जे कीड वाळलेल्या आदर्श कPa मूल्यांपेक्षा कमी आहे. त्यामुळे, सध्या पाणी देण्याची गरज नाही.
messages.en: Your crop does not need to be watered right now. The soil moisture in the "Manichaman" plot is 10 kPa and 6 kPa, which is lower than the ideal pest dried ideal pPa values. Therefore, there is no need to provide water at present.
messages.content_transliterated: tumachya pikala sadhya pani denyachi avashyakata nahi. "manikachaman" plautmadhye matichi ardrata 10 kPa ani 6 kPa aahe, j kid valalelya adarsh kPa mulyampeksa kami aahe. tyamule, sadhya pani denyachi garaj nahi.

messages.content: कोणती खत द्यावे
messages.en: Which fertilizer to give
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I apply to my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: konati khat dyave

messages.content:
तुमच्या "मनिकचमन" प्लॉटसाठी, सध्या तुम्हाला खालील खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल:

### सध्या (आठवडा 1 - बेरी विकास):
#### फोलिअर पद्धतीने:
- **गिब्बेरलिक आम्ल (GA3)**: 20 ppm/प्लांट
- **CPPU (0.1%)**: 1 ppm/प्लांट
- **जिंक ऑक्साइड**: 200 ग्रॅम/एकर

#### फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:
- **11-44-11**: 5.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
- **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट**: 6.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
- **साल्फेट ऑफ पोटाश**: 3 किलोग्राम/एकर
- **मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट**: 1 किलोग्राम/एकर

कृपया लक्षात ठेवा की फोलिअर खतांचा वापर करताना, एकूण 1% पेक्षा जास्त एकाग्रता वापरू नका. 

तुमच्या पुढील आठवड्यात (आठवडा 2) देखील काही खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल, ज्याची माहिती तुम्हाला पुढील वेळेस दिली जाईल.
messages.en:
For your "Manichaman" plot, you will currently need to use the following fertilizers:

### Currently (Week 1 - Berry Development):
#### Foliar Method:
- **Gibberellic acid (GA3)**: 20 ppm/plant
- **CPPU (0.1%)**: 1 ppm/plant
- **Zinc oxide**: 200 g/acre

#### Fertigation:
- **11-44-11**: 5.5 kg/acre
- **Calcium Nitrate**: 6.5 kg/acre
- **Sulfate of Potash**: 3 kg/acre
- **Magnesium Sulfate**: 1 kg/acre

Please keep in mind that when using foliar fertilizer, do not use more than a total concentration of more than 1%. 

You will also have to use some fertilizers in the next week (week 2), which will be informed to you next time.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "manikachaman" plotsathi, sadhya tumhala khalil khatancha vapar karava lagel:

### sadhya (athavada 1 - berry vikas):
#### foliar paddhatine:
- **gibberlik aml (GA3)**: 20 ppm/plant
- **CPPU (0.1%)**: 1 ppm/plant
- **jink oxide**: 200 gram/acre

#### fertigation paddhatine:
- **11-44-11**: 5.5 kilogram/acre
- **calcium nitrate**: 6.5 kilogram/acre
- **salphet of potash**: 3 kilogram/acre
- **magnesium sulphate**: 1 kilogram/acre

kripaya laksat theva key foliar khatancha vapar karatana, ekun 1% peksa jast ekagrata vaparu naka. 

tumachya pudhil athavadyat (athavada 2) dekhil kahi khatancha vapar karava lagel, jyachi mahiti tumhala pudhil veles dili jail.

messages.content:
आपल्या पिकासाठी (साखरेच्या काण्याचे) खत वापरण्याची शेड्यूल खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

### साखरेच्या काण्याचे खत वापरण्याची शेड्यूल:
- **सध्याची पिकाची अवस्था:** Grand growth (सुरूवात: 16 नोव्हेंबर 2025)
- **सध्याचा आठवडा:** 3

#### 1. आठवडा 3, दिवस 1:
- **फर्टिगेशन:** 
  - **12-61-0:** 2 किलोग्राम/एकर
  - **Urea:** 1.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
  - **फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल:** 1 किलोग्राम/एकर (इतर खतांच्या आधी 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे)

#### 2. आठवडा 3, दिवस 4:
- **फर्टिगेशन:** 
  - **पोटॅशियम नायट्रेट:** 4 किलोग्राम/एकर
  - **Urea:** 1 किलोग्राम/एकर
  - **मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट:** 1.5 किलोग्राम/एकर

### पुढील शेड्यूल:
- **आठवडा 4, दिवस 1:**
  - **फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल:** 1 किलोग्राम/एकर (इतर खतांच्या आधी 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे)
  - **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट:** 1.5 किलोग्राम/एकर (इतर खतांच्या नंतर 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे)

आपल्या दुसऱ्या प्लॉटसाठी (कॅप्सिकम प्लॉट 1) फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल उपलब्ध नाही कारण प्लॉट रिचार्ज कालावधी संपला आहे. कृपया रिचार्ज करा.
messages.en:
The following is the schedule for using fertilizer for your crop (sugar grains):

### Schedule for Using Sugar Kernel:
- **Current Crop Status:** Grand Growth (Starts: November 16, 2025)
- **Current Week:** 3

#### 1. Week 3, Day 1:
- **Fertigation:** 
  - **12-61-0:** 2 kg/acre
  - **Urea:** 1.5 kg/acre
  - **Phosphoric Acid:** 1 kg/acre (to be applied separately 15-20 minutes before other fertilizers)

#### 2. Week 3, Day 4:
- **Fertigation:** 
  - **Potassium Nitrate:** 4 kg/acre
  - **Urea:** 1 kg/acre
  - **Magnesium Sulfate:** 1.5 kg/acre

### Next Schedule:
- **Week 4, Day 1:**
  - **Phosphoric Acid:** 1 kg/acre (to be applied separately 15-20 minutes before other fertilizers)
  - **Calcium Nitrate:** 1.5kg/acre (apply separately 15-20 minutes after other fertilizers)

The fertigation schedule is not available for your second plot (Capsicum Plot 1) as the plot recharge period is over. Please recharge.

#### 2. athavada 3, divas 4:

  - **Urea:** 1 kilogram/acre
  - **magnesium sulphate:** 1.5 kilograms/acre

### pudhil schedule:

  - **phosphoric aml:** 1 kilogram/acre (itar khatanchya aadhi 15-20 minute vegale lagu karave)

initial_message: ગયા અઠવાડિયામાં મારા પાકને કયા રોગો કે જીવાતોએ અસર કરી?

messages.content: ગયા અઠવાડિયામાં મારા પાકને કયા રોગો કે જીવાતોએ અસર કરી?
messages.en: What diseases or pests have affected my crop in the past week?
messages.standalone_question: What diseases or pests affected my crop last week?
messages.content_transliterated: gaya athavadiyaman mara pakane kaya rogo ke jivatoe asar curry?

messages.content: ગયા અઠવાડિયામાં તમારા પાક "Vivek valu" માટે કોઈ રોગો કે જીવાતોની આગાહી ઉપલબ્ધ નથી. જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ તો કૃપા કરીને પૂછો.
messages.en: There are no diseases or pest forecasts available for your crop "Vivek value" in the last week. Please ask if you would like more information.
messages.content_transliterated: gaya athavadiyaman tamara pak "Vivek valu" mate koi rogo ke jivatoni agahi upalabdh nathi. jo tamne vadhu mahiti joie to krupa karine puchho.

initial_message: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकासाठी (द्राक्षे) खालील खतांचा वापर करावा:

### सध्याचा टप्पा: **Beginning of Bloom** (सुरुवात फुलांची)
- **सध्याची आठवडा:** 2
- **खतांचा वापर:** 
  1. **11-44-11** - 6.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
  2. **Calcium nitrate** - 1.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
  3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3.5 किलोग्राम/एकर

  **टीप:** 
  - फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल (Phosphoric acid) इतर खतांच्या वापरापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे.
  - कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट (Calcium nitrate) इतर खतांच्या वापरानंतर 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे.

### आगामी टप्पा: **Fruit Set** (फळ सेट)
- **आगामी आठवडा:** 1 (सुरूवात: 2025-12-13)
- **खतांचा वापर:** 
  1. **Ferrous Sulphate** - 600 ग्रॅम/एकर
  2. **Manganese Sulphate** - 600 ग्रॅम/एकर

तुमच्या पिकाच्या गरजेनुसार हे खत वापरा.
messages.en:
The following fertilizers should be used for your crop (grapes):

### Current Stage: **Beginning of Bloom**
- **Current Week:** 2
- **Fertilizer Use:** 
  1. **11-44-11** - 6.5kg/acre
  2. **Calcium nitrate** - 1.5 kg/acre
  3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3.5 kg/acre

**Sketch:** 
  - Phosphoric acid should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes before use of other fertilizers.
  - Calcium nitrate should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes after the use of other fertilizers.

### Next Phase: **Fruit Set**
- **Upcoming Week:** 1 (Starts: 2025-12-13)
- **Fertilizer Use:** 
  1. **Ferrous Sulphate** - 600 g/acre
  2. **Manganese Sulphate** - 600 g/acre

Use this fertilizer according to the needs of your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya pikasathi (drakshe) khalil khatancha vapar karava:

### sadhyacha tappa: **Beginning of Bloom** (suruvat fulanchi)
- **sadhyachi athavada:** 2
- **khatancha vapar:** 
  1. **11-44-11** - 6.5 kilogram/acre
  2. **Calcium nitrate** - 1.5 kilograms/acre
  3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 3.5 kilogram/acre

**tip:** 
  - phosphoric omle (Phosphoric acid) itar khatanchya vaparapurvi 15-20 minite swatantrapane lagoo karave.
  - calcium nitrate (Calcium nitrate) itar khatanchya vaparanantar 15-20 minite swatantrapane lagoo karave.

### agami tappa: **Fruit Set** (full set)
- **agami athavada:** 1 (suruvat: 2025-12-13)
- **khatancha vapar:** 
  1. **Ferrous Sulphate** - 600 gram/acre
  2. **Manganese Sulphate** - 600 gram/acre

tumachya pikachya garjenusar hey khat vapara.

initial_message: મારા પાકને પાણીની જરૂર છે

messages.content: મારા પાકને પાણીની જરૂર છે
messages.en: My crop needs water
messages.standalone_question: Does my crop need irrigation?
messages.content_transliterated: mara pakane panini jarur che

messages.content:
તમારા પાકને પાણીની જરૂર નથી. 

**પાક:** plot 1  
**માટીના ભેજનું પ્રમાણ:** 91%  
**ઓપ્ટિમલ માટી ભેજ:** 80%  

માટીમાં ભેજનું પ્રમાણ ઓપ્ટિમલ મર્યાદા કરતાં વધુ છે, તેથી હાલ પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી.
messages.en:
Your crops don't need water. 

**Plot:** plot 1  
**Soil moisture content:** 91%  
**Optimal soil moisture:** 80%  

The moisture content in the soil is above the optimal limit, so there is no need to water at present.
messages.content_transliterated:
tamara pakane panini jarur nathi. 

**pak:** plot 1  
**matina bhejanun praman:** 91%  
**optimal mati bhej:** 80%  

matiman bhejanun praman optimal maryada karatan vadhu che, tethi hal pani apavani jarur nathi.

initial_message: What fertiliser should I use for my crop?

messages.content: What fertiliser should I use for my crop?
messages.en: What fertiliser should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?

messages.content:
For your crop "Grapes" in the "Fruit Pruning" stage, here are the fertigation recommendations:

### Current Fertigation Schedule (Week 1)
- **Fertilizer for Foliar Spray:**
  - **Hydrogen Cyanamide:** 35 ml/l (maximum concentration of micro-nutrient fertilizers should not exceed 1%, e.g., 5 kg in 500 liters of water per acre).

### Next Fertigation Schedule (Starting from December 8, 2025)
- **Stage:** Break Bud
- **Fertigation Method:**
  - **Combination 1:**
    - 12-61-0: 2 kg/acre
    - Calcium Nitrate: 3.5 kg/acre
  - **Combination 2:**
    - 24-24-0: 3 kg/acre
    - Phosphoric Acid 80%: 1.5 kg/acre
  - **Combination 3:**
    - Calcium Nitrate: 5 kg/acre
    - Phosphoric Acid 80%: 2 kg/acre

### Important Notes:
- Phosphoric acid should be applied separately, 15-20 minutes before the application of other fertilizers.
- Calcium nitrate should be applied separately, 15-20 minutes after the application of other fertilizers.

Make sure to follow these guidelines for effective fertigation!

initial_message: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "Banana plot 3" साठी, सध्या तुम्ही "Grand growth" टप्प्यात आहात, जो 29 नोव्हेंबर 2025 पासून सुरू झाला आहे. या टप्प्यात, तुम्हाला खालील खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल:

### सध्याचा फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (सप्ताह 1):
1. **मातीच्या अनुप्रयोगाद्वारे:**
   - **युरिया:** 75 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
   - **मुरीट ऑफ पोटाश:** 146 किग्रॅ/प्लांट

2. **फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीद्वारे:**
   - **12-61-0:** 2 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
   - **युरिया:** 9 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
   - **मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट:** 3.5 किग्रॅ/प्लांट

   किंवा

   - **24-24-0:** 7 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
   - **युरिया:** 6 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
   - **मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट:** 3.5 किग्रॅ/प्लांट

   किंवा

   - **युरिया:** 9.5 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
   - **फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल (80%):** 2 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
   - **मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट:** 3.5 किग्रॅ/प्लांट

### पुढील फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (सप्ताह 2):
- **पोटॅशियम नाइट्रेट:** 7 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
- **युरिया:** 7.5 किग्रॅ/प्लांट
- **कॅल्शियम नाइट्रेट:** 3 किग्रॅ/प्लांट

तुम्ही फर्टिगेशन करताना फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल वेगळे लागू करणे आवश्यक आहे, इतर खतांच्या अनुप्रयोगाच्या 15-20 मिनिटे आधी.
messages.en:
For your "Banana plot 3", you are currently in the "Grand growth" phase, which starts on November 29, 2025. During this step, you will need to use the following fertilizers:

### Current Fertigation Schedule (Week 1):
1. **Through Soil Application:**
   - **Urea:** 75 kg/plant
   - **Murit of Potash:** 146 kg/plant

2. **By Fertigation Method:**
   - **12-61-0:** 2 kg/plant
   - **Urea:** 9 kg/plant
   - **Magnesium Sulfate:** 3.5 kg/plant

or

- **24-24-0:** 7 kg/plant
   - **Urea:** 6 kg/plant
   - **Magnesium Sulfate:** 3.5 kg/plant

or

- **Urea:** 9.5 kg/plant
   - **Phosphoric acid (80%):** 2 kg/plant
   - **Magnesium Sulfate:** 3.5 kg/plant

### Next Fertigation Schedule (Week 2):
- **Potassium Nitrate:** 7 kg/plant
- **Urea:** 7.5 kg/plant
- **Calcium Nitrate:** 3 kg/plant

You need to apply phosphoric acid separately during fertigation, 15-20 minutes before the application of other fertilizers.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya "Banana plot 3" sathi, sadhya tumhi "Grand growth" tappyat ahat, joe 29 november 2025 pasun suru jhala aahe. ya tappyat, tumhala khalil khatancha vapar karava lagel:

### sadhyacha fertigation schedule (saptah 1):
1. **matichya anuprayogadvare:**
   - **urea:** 75 kigra/plant
   - **murit of potash:** 146 kigra/plant

2. **fertigation paddhatidvare:**
   - **12-61-0:** 2 kigra/plant
   - **urea:** 9 kigra/plant
   - **magnesium sulphate:** 3.5 kigra/plant

kinva

- **24-24-0:** 7 kigra/plant
   - **urea:** 6 kigra/plant
   - **magnesium sulphate:** 3.5 kigra/plant

kinva

- **urea:** 9.5 kigra/plant
   - **phosphoric aml (80%):** 2 kigra/plant
   - **magnesium sulphate:** 3.5 kigra/plant

### pudhil fertigation schedule (saptah 2):
- **potassium nitrate:** 7 kigra/plant
- **urea:** 7.5 kigra/plant
- **calcium nitrate:** 3 kigra/plant

tumhi fertigation karatana phosphoric aml vegale lagu karane avashyak aahe, itar khatanchya anuprayogachya 15-20 minute aadhi.

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकासाठी (द्राक्षे) खत वापरण्याची शेड्यूल खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

### SSN plot no 2 (1.1 acres)
- **सध्याची अवस्था:** बेरी विकास (Berry Development)
- **सध्याचा आठवडा:** 3
- **खतांची शिफारस:**
  1. **19-19-19** - 5 किलोग्राम/एकर
  2. **Sulfate of Potash** - 5.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
  3. **Magnesium Sulphate** - 2.5 किलोग्राम/एकर

  **किंवा**
  
  1. **6-34-17** - 4 किलोग्राम/एकर
  2. **Calcium nitrate** - 4.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
  3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 6 किलोग्राम/एकर
  4. **Magnesium Sulphate** - 2.5 किलोग्राम/एकर

  **किंवा**
  
  1. **Calcium nitrate** - 6 किलोग्राम/एकर
  2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 2 किलोग्राम/एकर
  3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 7.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
  4. **Magnesium Sulphate** - 2.5 किलोग्राम/एकर

- **नोट्स:**
  - फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल (Phosphoric acid) इतर खतांच्या अनुप्रयोगापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे.
  - कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट (Calcium nitrate) इतर खतांच्या अनुप्रयोगानंतर 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे.

### SSN juna (1 acre)
- **सध्याची अवस्था:** प्रारंभिक वेरायझन (Beginning Veraison)
- **खतांची शेड्यूल उपलब्ध नाही.**

तुमच्या दुसऱ्या प्लॉटसाठी (SSN plot no 2) वर दिलेल्या शेड्यूलनुसार खतांचा वापर करा.
messages.en:

### SSN plot no 2 (1.1 acres)
- **Current Status:** Berry Development
- **Current Week:** 3
- **Fertilizer Recommendation:**
  1. **19-19-19** - 5kg/acre
  2. **Sulfate of Potash** - 5.5 kg/acre
  3. **Magnesium Sulphate** - 2.5 kg/acre

**OR**
  
1. **6-34-17** - 4 kg/acre
  2. **Calcium nitrate** - 4.5 kg/acre
  3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 6 kg/acre
  4. **Magnesium Sulphate** - 2.5 kg/acre

**OR**
  
1. **Calcium nitrate** - 6 kg/acre
  2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 2kg/acre
  3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 7.5 kg/acre
  4. **Magnesium Sulphate** - 2.5 kg/acre

-**Notes:**
  - Phosphoric acid should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.
  - Calcium nitrate should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes after application of other fertilizers.

### SSN juna (1 acre)
- **Current State:** Beginning Veraison
- **No fertilizer schedule available.**

For your second plot (SSN plot no 2), use fertilizers as per the schedule given above.

  1. **19-19-19** - 5 kilogram/acre
  2. **Sulfate of Potash** - 5.5 kilogram/acre
  3. **Magnesium Sulphate** - 2.5 kilograms/acre

**kinva**
  
1. **6-34-17** - 4 kilogram/acre
  2. **Calcium nitrate** - 4.5 kilograms/acre
  3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 6 kilogram/acre
  4. **Magnesium Sulphate** - 2.5 kilograms/acre

**kinva**
  
1. **Calcium nitrate** - 6 kilogram/acre
  2. **Phosphoric acid 80%** - 2 kilogram/acre
  3. **Sulfate of Potash** - 7.5 kilogram/acre
  4. **Magnesium Sulphate** - 2.5 kilograms/acre

-**Notes:**
  - phosphoric omle (Phosphoric acid) itar khatanchya anuprayogapoorvee 15-20 minite swatantrapane lagoo karave.
  - calcium nitrate (Calcium nitrate) itar khatanchya anuprayoganantar 15-20 minite swatantrapane lagoo karave.

### SSN juna (1 acre)
- **sadhyachi avastha:** prarambhik verayjhan (Beginning Veraison)

initial_message: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या पिकासाठी खत वापरण्याबाबत माहिती खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

1. **Gorakh's plot**: तुमच्या प्लॉटची रिचार्ज कालावधी संपली आहे, त्यामुळे डेटा पाहण्यासाठी कृपया रिचार्ज करा.
   
2. **सुधाकर ड्राक्ष**: तुमच्या प्लॉटची रिचार्ज कालावधी संपली आहे, त्यामुळे डेटा पाहण्यासाठी कृपया रिचार्ज करा.

3. **Plot No 1 Sudhakar**: या प्लॉटमध्ये कोणतेही पीक लागवड केलेले नाही.

कृपया रिचार्ज केल्यास अधिक माहिती मिळवू शकता.
messages.en:
The information about using fertilizer for your crop is as follows:

1. **Gorakh's plot**: The recharge period of your plot is over, so please recharge to see the data.
   
2. **Sudhakar Drawn**: The recharge period of your plot is over, so please recharge to see the data.

3. **Plot No 1 Sudhakar**: No crop has been planted in this plot.

Please get more information if you recharge.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya pikasathi khat vaparanyababat mahiti khaleelapramane aahe:

1. **Gorakh's plot**: tumachya plautachi recharge kalavadhi sampli aahe, tyamule data pahanyasathi kripya recharge kara.
   
2. **sudhakar draksh**: tumachya plautachi recharge kalavadhi sampli aahe, tyamule data pahanyasathi kripya recharge kara.

3. **Plot No 1 Sudhakar**: ya platmadhye kontehi peak lagavad kelele nahi.

krupaya recharge kelyas adhik mahiti milavu shakta.

initial_message: What fertiliser should I use for my crop?

messages.content: What fertiliser should I use for my crop?
messages.en: What fertiliser should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?

messages.content:
For your grape crop in the "Cane thinning" stage, no fertigation is needed this week (current date: November 30, 2025). 

However, the next fertigation schedule starts on December 7, 2025, for the "Subcane" stage. Here are the recommended fertilizers:

1. **Option 1:**
   - Mono potassium phosphate: 3.5 kg/acre
   - Phosphoric acid 80%: 5 kg/acre (apply separately, 15-20 minutes before other fertilizers)

2. **Option 2:**
   - 0-60-20: 6 kg/acre
   - Phosphoric acid 80%: 2.5 kg/acre (apply separately)

3. **Option 3:**
   - Phosphoric acid 80%: 7 kg/acre (apply separately)
   - Sulfate of Potash: 2.5 kg/acre

Make sure to follow the instructions for application timing and method.

messages.content: તમારા પાક "potatocolombo" માટે પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી, કારણ કે હાલની જમીનની ભેજ 90% છે, જે 80% ના ઓપ્ટિમલ ભેજથી વધુ છે.
messages.en: There is no need to water your crop "potatocolombo", because the current soil moisture is 90%, which is more than the optimal moisture of 80%.
messages.content_transliterated: tamara pak "potatocolombo" mate pani apavani jarur nathi, karan ke halani jaminani bhej 90% che, jay 80% na optimal bhejathi vadhu che.

initial_message: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?

messages.content: મારા પાક માટે કયું ખાતર વાપરવું?
messages.en: Which fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mara pak mate kayu khatar vaparvu?

messages.content:
તમારા પાક માટે, હાલની ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ મુજબ, "પોમગ્રાનેટ" માટેની ફર્ટિગેશનની વિગતો નીચે મુજબ છે:

### હાલની સ્થિતિ: 
- **પાકનું નામ:** પોમગ્રાનેટ
- **હાલની તબક્કો:** પ્રારંભિક ફળ વિકાસ (Early stage fruit growth)
- **હાલનો અઠવાડિયો:** 5

### ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:
1. **ફોલિયર પદ્ધતિ દ્વારા:**
   - **Sagarika:** 2 મલ/લિટર
   - **Biovita:** 2 મલ/લિટર
   - **Pure Kelp:** 2 મલ/લિટર
   - **Basfoliar:** 2 મલ/લિટર
   - **Acadian:** 2 મલ/લિટર
   - *નોંધ:* ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે માટે માઇક્રો-ન્યુટ્રિયન્ટ ખાતરોની સંકેત 1% થી વધુ ન હોવી જોઈએ (ઉદાહરણ: 5 કિલો 500 લિટર પાણીમાં).

2. **ફર્ટિગેશન પદ્ધતિ દ્વારા:**
   - **Urea:** 2 કિલો/એકર
   - **Calcium nitrate:** 2.5 કિલો/એકર
   - *નોંધ:* કૅલ્શિયમ નાઇટ્રેટ અન્ય ખાતરોની એપ્લિકેશન પછી 15-20 મિનિટ પછી લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.

### આગામી શેડ્યૂલ:
- **આગામી તબક્કો:** મધ્યમ તબક્કો ફળ વિકાસ (Mid stage fruit growth)
- **આગામી અઠવાડિયો:** 6 (શરૂઆત તારીખ: 2026-02-11)
  
આ માહિતીનો ઉપયોગ કરીને, તમે યોગ્ય ખાતરનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો.
messages.en:
For your crop, as per the current fertigation schedule, the details of fertigation for "Pomegranate" are as follows:

### Current status: 
- **Name of the crop:** Pomegranate
- **Current stage:** Early stage fruit growth
- **Current week:** 5

### Fertigation schedule:
1. **By foliar method:**
   - **Sagarika:** 2 ml/litre
   - **Biovita:** 2 ml/liter
   - **Pure Kelp:** 2 ml/liter
   - **Basfoliar:** 2 ml/liter
   - **Acadian:** 2 ml/liter
   - *Note:* The indication of micro-nutrient fertilizers for foliar spray should not exceed 1% (example: 5 kg in 500 liters of water).

2. **By fertigation method:**
   - **Urea:** 2 kg/acre
   - **Calcium nitrate:** 2.5 kg/acre
   *Note:* Calcium nitrate should be applied 15-20 minutes after application of other fertilizers.

### Next schedule:
- **Next stage:** Mid-stage fruit growth
- **Next week:** 6 (start date: 2026-02-11)
  
Using this information, you can use the right fertilizer.
messages.content_transliterated:
tamara pak mate, halani fertigation schedule mujab, "pomgranet" mateni fartigeshanani vigato nice mujab che:

### halani sthiti: 
- **pakanun nam:** pomgranet
- **halani tabakko:** praranbhik fad vikas (Early stage fruit growth)
- **halano athavadiyo:** 5

### fertigation schedule:
1. **follier paddhati dvara:**
   - **Sagarika:** 2 mal/litre
   - **Biovita:** 2 mal/litre
   - **Pure Kelp:** 2 mal/litre
   - **Basfoliar:** 2 mal/litre
   - **Acadian:** 2 mal/litre
   - *nondh:* follier spray mate micro-nyutriyant khataroni sanket 1% thi vadhu n hovi joie (udaharan: 5 kilo 500 litre paniman).

2. **fertigation paddhati dvara:**
   - **Urea:** 2 kilo/acre
   - **Calcium nitrate:** 2.5 kilo/acre
   - *nondh:* calcium nitrate any khataroni application pachi 15-20 minute pachi lagu karvu joie.

### agami schedule:
- **agami tabakko:** madhyam tabakko fad vikas (Mid stage fruit growth)
- **agami athavadiyo:** 6 (sharuat tarikh: 2026-02-11)
  
a mahitino upayog karine, tame yogy khatarano upayog kari shako cho.

messages.content: હાલ કઈ દવા આપવી જોઈએ
messages.en: What medicine should be given right now?
messages.standalone_question: What medication should be administered currently?
messages.content_transliterated: hal kai dava apavi joie

messages.content:
આજે તમારા પાક માટેની જરૂરિયાતો નીચે મુજબ છે:

### 1. **ફર્ટિગેશન (Fertigation)**
- **આજનું ફર્ટિગેશન**: 
  - **હ્યુમિક એસિડ**: 1 લિટર/એકર
  - નોંધ: ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડને અન્ય ખાતરોની એપ્લિકેશન કરતા 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા અલગથી લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.

### 2. **જળ આપવું (Irrigation)**
- **મૂળભૂત માળખું**: 
  - **મૂળભૂત ભેજ**: 90% 
  - **ઓપ્ટિમલ ભેજ**: 80%
  - **જળ આપવાની જરૂર નથી**, કારણ કે ભેજનું પ્રમાણ ઓપ્ટિમલ મર્યાદા કરતાં વધુ છે.

### 3. **સ્પ્રે શરતો (Spray Conditions)**
- **આજે સ્પ્રે માટેની શ્રેષ્ઠ શરતો**: 
  - આજે રાત્રે 10:30 થી 12:30 સુધીના સમયગાળા દરમિયાન સ્પ્રે માટે આદર્શ શરતો છે.

### 4. **કૃષિ પ્રવૃત્તિઓ (Farmer Activities)**
- આજના દિવસે કોઈ ખાસ કૃષિ પ્રવૃત્તિઓની જરૂર નથી.

આ માહિતીના આધારે, આજે ફર્ટિગેશન માટે હ્યુમિક એસિડ લાગુ કરો અને સ્પ્રે માટેની શ્રેષ્ઠ શરતોનો લાભ લો.
messages.en:
The requirements for your crop today are as follows:

### 1. **Fertigation**
- **Today's Fertigation**: 
  - **Humic Acid**: 1 liter/acre
  - Note: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.

### 2. **Irrigation**
- **Basic Infrastructure**: 
  - **Basic humidity**: 90% 
  - **Optimal humidity**: 80%
  - **No need to water**, as the humidity level is higher than the optimal limit.

### 3. **Spray Conditions**
- **Best conditions for spraying today**: 
  - The ideal conditions for spraying are between 10:30 p.m. to 12:30 p.m. tonight.

### 4. **Farmer Activities**
- No special agricultural activities are required on this day.

Based on this information, apply humic acid for fertigation today and take advantage of the best conditions for spraying.
messages.content_transliterated:
aje tamara pak mateni jaruriyato nice mujab che:

### 1. **fertigation (Fertigation)**
- **ajanun fertigation**: 
  - **humic acid**: 1 litre/acre
  - nondh: phosphoric esidane any khataroni application karta 15-20 minute pela alagathi lagu karvu joie.

### 2. **jal apvu (Irrigation)**
- **mulabhut malakhun**: 
  - **mulabhut bhej**: 90% 
  - **optimal bhej**: 80%
  - **jal apavani jarur nathi**, karan ke bhejanun praman optimal maryada karatan vadhu che.

### 3. **spray sharato (Spray Conditions)**
- **aje spray mateni shreshth sharato**: 
  - aje ratre 10:30 thi 12:30 sudhina samayagala darmian spray mate adarsh sharato che.

### 4. **krishi pravrittio (Farmer Activities)**
- ajana divase koi khas krishi pravrittioni jarur nathi.

a mahitina adhare, aje fertigation mate humic acid lagu karo ane spray mateni shreshth sharatono labh low.

initial_message: શું મને મારી પાકને પાણી આપવું જોઈએ?

messages.content: શું મને મારી પાકને પાણી આપવું જોઈએ?
messages.en: Should I water my crops?
messages.standalone_question: Should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: shu mane mari pakane pani apvu joie?

messages.content:
હા, "plot 1" માટે પાણી આપવું જોઈએ. 

- **મૂળભૂત માહિતી**: 
  - જમીનનું આકર્ષણ: 200 kPa (ખૂબ જ સૂકું)
  - જમીનનું આકર્ષણ: 22 kPa (સૂકું)
  - આદર્શ આકર્ષણ: 24 kPa

જમીનનું આકર્ષણ 200 kPa છે, જે ખૂબ જ સૂકું છે. કૃપા કરીને ખાતરી કરો કે ઉપકરણ યોગ્ય રીતે કાર્ય કરી રહ્યું છે, કારણ કે આકર્ષણની આ મૂલ્યમાં શક્યતાના કારણે વાયર નુકસાન અથવા ઉપકરણ હવામાં હોઈ શકે છે. તમે આ સમસ્યાને ઉકેલવા માટે સપોર્ટ ટિકિટ ઉઠાવી શકો છો.
messages.en:
Yes, water should be given for "plot 1". 

- **Basic Information**: 
  - Ground attractiveness: 200 kPa (very dry)
  - Ground attractiveness: 22 kPa (dry)
  - Ideal Attraction: 24 kPa

The soil has an attractiveness of 200 kPa, which is very dry. Please make sure the device is working properly, as this value of attraction may cause wire damage or the device may be in the air. You can pick up a support ticket to solve this problem.
messages.content_transliterated:
ha, "plot 1" mate pani apvu joie. 

- **mulabhut mahiti**: 
  - jaminanun akarshan: 200 kPa (khub j sukun)
  - jaminanun akarshan: 22 kPa (sukun)
  - adarsh akarshan: 24 kPa

jaminanun akarshan 200 kPa che, jay khoob j sukun che. krupa karine khatri karo ke upakaran yogy rite kary kari rahyu che, karan ke akarshanani a mulyaman shakyatana karne wire nukasan athava upakaran havaman hoi shake che. tame a samasyane ukelava mate support ticket uthavi shako cho.

initial_message: जमिनीचं तापमान पिकाच्या योग्य वाढीसाठी किती असावे

messages.content: जमिनीचं तापमान पिकाच्या योग्य वाढीसाठी किती असावे
messages.en: What should be the temperature of the soil for proper growth of the crop?
messages.standalone_question: What should be the ideal soil temperature for proper crop growth?
messages.content_transliterated: jaminichn tapaman pikachya yogy vadhisathi kiti asave

messages.content:
पिकाच्या योग्य वाढीसाठी जमिनीचं तापमान सामान्यतः 20 ते 30 डिग्री सेल्सियस असावं. काही पिकांसाठी, विशेषतः भाजीपाला आणि फळांच्या पिकांसाठी, तापमान 15 ते 25 डिग्री सेल्सियस असणं अधिक अनुकूल असू शकतं. 

तुमच्या पिकाच्या प्रकारानुसार तापमानाची आवश्यकता थोडी वेगळी असू शकते, त्यामुळे विशिष्ट पिकासाठी अधिक माहिती हवी असल्यास कृपया सांगा.
messages.en:
The temperature of the soil should generally be 20 to 30 degrees Celsius for proper growth of the crop. For some crops, especially vegetable and fruit crops, temperatures of 15 to 25 degrees Celsius may be more favorable. 

The temperature requirements may vary slightly depending on your crop type, so please let us know if you need more information for a particular crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
pikachya yogy vadhisathi jaminichn tapaman samanyatah 20 te 30 degree celsius asavam. kahi pikansathi, visheshatah bhajipala ani phalanchya pikansathi, tapaman 15 te 25 degree celsius asanam adhik anukul asu shakatn. 

tumachya pikachya prakaranusar tapamanachi avashyakata thodi vegali asu shakate, tyamule vishist pikasathi adhik mahiti havi asalyas kripaya sanga.

messages.content: ऊस पिकासासाठी जमिनीचें तापमान योग्य वाढीसाठी किती असावे
messages.en: What should be the soil temperature for proper growth for sugarcane crop?
messages.standalone_question: What should be the ideal soil temperature for the proper growth of sugarcane?
messages.content_transliterated: us pikasasathi jaminichen tapaman yogy vadhisathi kiti asave

messages.content:
ऊस पिकासाठी जमिनीचं तापमान 20 ते 30 डिग्री सेल्सियस असावं. या तापमानात ऊसाची वाढ आणि विकास चांगला होतो. तापमान 15 डिग्री सेल्सियसच्या खाली गेल्यास ऊसाच्या वाढीवर नकारात्मक परिणाम होऊ शकतो. 

तुमच्या पिकाच्या वाढीसाठी योग्य तापमान राखणं महत्त्वाचं आहे.
messages.en:
For sugarcane crop, the soil temperature should be 20 to 30 degrees Celsius. At this temperature, the growth and development of sugarcane is good. If the temperature falls below 15 degrees Celsius, the growth of sugarcane can be negatively affected. 

Maintaining the right temperature is important for the growth of your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
us pikasathi jaminichn tapaman 20 te 30 degree celsius asavam. ya tapamanat usaachi vadh ani vikas changala hoto. tapaman 15 degree selsiyasachya khali gelyas usaachya vadhivar nakaratmak parinam hou shakato. 

tumachya pikachya vadhisathi yogy tapaman rakhanam mahattvacham aahe.

messages.content: ऊस पिकामध्ये जमिनीचं तापमान पंधरा डिग्रीच्या खाली गेल्यावरती ऊसामध्ये कोणत्या उपाययोजना कराव्या
messages.en: What measures should be taken in sugarcane when the soil temperature drops below fifteen degrees in sugarcane crop?
messages.standalone_question: What measures should be taken if the soil temperature for sugarcane drops below fifteen degrees Celsius?
messages.content_transliterated: us pikamadhye jaminichn tapaman pandhara digrichya khali gelyavarati usaamadhye konatya upayayojana karavya

messages.content:
जर ऊस पिकामध्ये जमिनीचं तापमान पंधरा डिग्री सेल्सियसच्या खाली गेलं, तर खालील उपाययोजना कराव्यात:

1. **मुलीकरण (Mulching)**: जमिनीवर चांगलं मुलीकरण करा, ज्यामुळे तापमान स्थिर राहील आणि थंडीत कमी होईल.

2. **पाण्याची योग्य व्यवस्था**: जमिनीला पाण्याची योग्य मात्रा द्या, कारण पाण्यामुळे जमिनीचं तापमान थोडं वाढू शकतं.

3. **पिकांचे संरक्षण**: थंड वाऱ्यापासून पिकांचे संरक्षण करण्यासाठी तात्पुरती शेड किंवा जाळी वापरा.

4. **पिकांची निगरानी**: पिकांची नियमितपणे तपासणी करा आणि कोणत्याही रोग किंवा कीडांचा सामना करण्यासाठी योग्य उपाययोजना करा.

5. **सेंद्रिय खतांचा वापर**: सेंद्रिय खतांचा वापर करून जमिनीची आरोग्य सुधारण्याचा प्रयत्न करा, ज्यामुळे पिकांची वाढ चांगली होईल.

या उपाययोजनांनी ऊस पिकाच्या वाढीवर सकारात्मक परिणाम होऊ शकतो.
messages.en:
If the soil temperature falls below fifteen degrees Celsius in the sugarcane crop, the following measures should be taken:

1. **Mulching**: Do good mulching on the ground, which will keep the temperature stable and reduce in the cold.

2. Proper water management: Give the soil the right amount of water, as water can increase the temperature of the soil a little.

3. **Crop Protection**: Use temporary sheds or nets to protect crops from cold winds.

4. **Crop Monitoring**: Inspect the crops regularly and take appropriate measures to combat any diseases or pests.

5. **Use of Organic Fertilizers**: Try to improve soil health by using organic fertilizers, which will lead to better crop growth.

These measures can have a positive impact on the growth of sugarcane crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
jar us pikamadhye jaminichn tapaman pandhara degree selsiyasachya khali gelam, tar khalil upayayojana karavyat:

1. **mulikaran (Mulching)**: jaminivar changalam mulikaran kara, jyamule tapaman sthir rahil ani thandit kami hoil.

2. **panyachi yogy vyavastha**: jaminila panyachi yogy matra dya, karan panyamule jaminichn tapaman thodam vadhu shakatn.

3. **pikanche sanraksan**: thand varyapasun pikanche sanraksan karanyasathi tatpurati shed kinva jali vapara.

4. **pikanchi nigrani**: pikanchi niyamitapane tapasani kara ani konatyahi rog kinva kidancha samana karanyasathi yogy upayayojana kara.

5. **sendriy khatancha vapar**: sendriy khatancha vapar karun jaminichi arogy sudharanyacha prayatn kara, jyamule pikanchi vadh changali hoil.

ya upayayojananni us pikachya vadhivar sakaratmak parinam hou shakato.

messages.content: अति थंडीच्या काळामध्ये ऊस पिकाचे अन्नद्रव्य व्यवस्थापन कसे करावे
messages.en: How to Nutrient Management of Sugarcane Crop During Extreme Cold
messages.standalone_question: How should nutrient management be handled for sugarcane crops during extreme cold conditions?
messages.content_transliterated: ati thandichya kalamadhye us pikache annadravy vyavasthapan kase karave

messages.content:
अति थंडीच्या काळामध्ये ऊस पिकाचे अन्नद्रव्य व्यवस्थापन करण्यासाठी खालील उपाययोजना करा:

1. **फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल**: सध्या (30 नोव्हेंबर 2025) ऊस पिकासाठी कोणतीही फर्टिगेशन आवश्यक नाही. पुढील फर्टिगेशन 2026 च्या 17 मे पासून सुरू होईल, जेव्हा तुम्हाला खालील अन्नद्रव्ये लागू करावी लागतील:
   - **पोटॅशियम नायट्रेट**: 2 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **युरिया**: 4.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट**: 2 किलोग्राम/एकर (याला इतर खतांच्या 15-20 मिनिटांनंतर लागू करावे)

2. **अन्नद्रव्यांचे योग्य प्रमाण**: थंडीच्या काळात अन्नद्रव्यांचे प्रमाण कमी करणे आवश्यक आहे, कारण पिकाची वाढ मंदावते. त्यामुळे, अन्नद्रव्यांचे प्रमाण कमी करून त्यांची योग्य मात्रा वापरा.

3. **पाण्याची योग्य व्यवस्था**: थंडीत पाण्याची योग्य मात्रा द्या, कारण पाण्यामुळे जमिनीचं तापमान थोडं वाढू शकतं.

4. **पिकांचे संरक्षण**: थंड वाऱ्यापासून पिकांचे संरक्षण करण्यासाठी तात्पुरती शेड किंवा जाळी वापरा.

5. **सेंद्रिय खतांचा वापर**: सेंद्रिय खतांचा वापर करून जमिनीची आरोग्य सुधारण्याचा प्रयत्न करा, ज्यामुळे पिकांची वाढ चांगली होईल.

या उपाययोजनांनी ऊस पिकाच्या वाढीवर सकारात्मक परिणाम होऊ शकतो.
messages.en:
For nutrient management of sugarcane crop during extreme winters, take the following measures:

1. **Fertigation Schedule**: At present (30th November 2025) no fertigation is required for sugarcane crop. The next fertigation will begin on May 17, 2026, when you will need to apply the following nutrients:
   - **Potassium nitrate**: 2 kg/acre
   - **Urea**: 4.5 kg/acre
   - **Calcium Nitrate**: 2 kg/acre (this should be applied after 15-20 minutes of other fertilizers)

2. **Proper Nutrient Ratio**: It is necessary to reduce the amount of nutrients during winters, as the growth of the crop slows down. Therefore, reduce the amount of nutrients and use them in the right amount.

3. Proper water management: Give the right amount of water in winter, as water can increase the temperature of the soil a little.

4. **Crop Protection**: Use temporary sheds or nets to protect crops from cold winds.

5. **Use of Organic Fertilizers**: Try to improve soil health by using organic fertilizers, which will lead to better crop growth.

These measures can have a positive impact on the growth of sugarcane crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
ati thandichya kalamadhye us pikache annadravy vyavasthapan karanyasathi khalil upayayojana kara:

1. **fertigation schedule**: sadhya (30 november 2025) us pikasathi konatihi fertigation avashyak nahi. pudhil fertigation 2026 chya 17 may pasun suru hoil, jevha tumhala khalil annadravye lagu karavi lagatil:
   - **potassium nitrate**: 2 kilogram/acre
   - **urea**: 4.5 kilograms/acre
   - **calcium nitrate**: 2 kilogram/acre (yala itar khatanchya 15-20 minitannantar lagu karave)

2. **annadravyanche yogy praman**: thandichya kalat annadravyanche praman kami karane avashyak aahe, karan pikachi vadh mandavate. tyamule, annadravyanche praman kami karun tyanchi yogy matra vapara.

3. **panyachi yogy vyavastha**: thandit panyachi yogy matra dya, karan panyamule jaminichn tapaman thodam vadhu shakatn.

4. **pikanche sanraksan**: thand varyapasun pikanche sanraksan karanyasathi tatpurati shed kinva jali vapara.

5. **sendriy khatancha vapar**: sendriy khatancha vapar karun jaminichi arogy sudharanyacha prayatn kara, jyamule pikanchi vadh changali hoil.

ya upayayojananni us pikachya vadhivar sakaratmak parinam hou shakato.

initial_message: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?

messages.content: माझ्या पिकासाठी कोणते खत वापरावे?
messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizers should I use for my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: mazya pikasathi conte khat vaparave?

messages.content:
तुमच्या साखरेच्या पिकासाठी, सध्या तुम्ही "तिल्लींग" टप्प्यात आहात, जो 2025-11-19 पासून सुरू झाला आहे. सध्या तुम्हाला पुढील खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल:

### सध्याचा खत वापर:
- **अमोनियम सल्फेट**: 134 किलोग्राम/एकर

### पुढील खत वापर (तिल्लींग टप्पा, आठवडा 3):
- **पोटॅशियम नाइट्रेट**: 2 किलोग्राम/एकर
- **युरिया**: 3 किलोग्राम/एकर
- **सल्फेट ऑफ पोटाश**: 1 किलोग्राम/एकर

कृपया या खतांचा वापर योग्य पद्धतीने करा.
messages.en:
For your sugar crop, you are currently in the "tilling" phase, which starts from 2025-11-19. Currently, you will need to use the following fertilizers:

### Current Fertilizer Usage:
- **Ammonium Sulfate**: 134 kg/acre

### Use the following fertilizer (Tilling Phase, Week 3):
- **Potassium Nitrate**: 2 kg/acre
- **Urea**: 3 kg/acre
- **Sulphate of Potash**: 1 kg/acre

Please use these fertilizers properly.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya sakharechya pikasathi, sadhya tumhi "tilling" tappyat ahat, joe 2025-11-19 pasun suru jhala aahe. sadhya tumhala pudhil khatancha vapar karava lagel:

### sadhyacha khat vapar:
- **ammonium sulphate**: 134 kilogram/acre

### pudhil khat vapar (tilling tappa, athavada 3):
- **potassium nitrate**: 2 kilogram/acre
- **urea**: 3 kilogram/acre
- **sulphate of potash**: 1 kilogram/acre

kripaya ya khatancha vapar yogy paddhatine kara.

messages.content: पाणी केव्हा देऊ
messages.en: When to give water
messages.standalone_question: When should I water my crop?
messages.content_transliterated: pani kevha deu

messages.content:
तुमच्या साखरेच्या पिकासाठी सध्या पाण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. सध्या तुमच्या मातीतील आर्द्रता खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

- **सध्याची आर्द्रता**:
  - माती 1: 100% (खूप ओलसर)
  - माती 2: 93% (ओलसर)

### पुढील पाण्याची आवश्यकता:
तुम्हाला पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता 2025-12-17 रोजी 04:30 वाजता असेल, जर त्या दिवशी पाऊस झाला नाही तर. 

तुमच्या पिकाची योग्य वाढ सुनिश्चित करण्यासाठी आर्द्रता लक्षात ठेवा.
messages.en:
Your sugar crop doesn't need water right now. The current moisture content in your soil is as follows:

- **Current Humidity**:
  Soil 1: 100% (very moist)
  - Soil 2: 93% (moist)

### The following water requirements:
You will need to give water on 2025-12-17 at 04:30, if it does not rain on that day. 

Keep humidity in mind to ensure proper growth of your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tumachya sakharechya pikasathi sadhya panyachi avashyakata nahi. sadhya tumachya matitil ardrata khalilapramane aahe:

- **sadhyachi ardrata**:
  - mati 1: 100% (khup olsar)
  - mati 2: 93% (olsar)

### pudhil panyachi avashyakata:
tumhala pani denyachi avashyakata 2025-12-17 roji 04:30 vajata asel, jar tya divashi paus jhala nahi tar. 

tumachya pikachi yogy vadh sunishchit karanyasathi ardrata laksat theva.

initial_message: मागील आठवड्यात माझ्या पिकावर कोणते रोग किंवा कीड आली होती?

messages.content: मागील आठवड्यात माझ्या पिकावर कोणते रोग किंवा कीड आली होती?
messages.en: What disease or pest did my crop suffer last week?
messages.standalone_question: What diseases or pests affected my crop last week?
messages.content_transliterated: magil athavadyat mazya pikavar conte rog kinva kid ali hoti?

messages.content: मागील आठवड्यात (2025-11-23 ते 2025-11-29) आपल्या पिकावर कोणतेही रोग किंवा कीड आढळले नाहीत. दोन्ही रोग आणि कीड यांचे मेट्रिक्स उपलब्ध नाहीत.
messages.en: Last week (2025-11-23 to 2025-11-29) no diseases or pests were found on your crop. Metrics for both diseases and pests are not available.
messages.content_transliterated: magil athavadyat (2025-11-23 te 2025-11-29) apalya pikavar konatehi rog kinva kid adhalale nahit. donhi rog ani kid yanche metrics upalabdh nahit.

messages.en: What fertilizer should I use for my crop?

messages.content: तुमच्या पिकासाठी खत वापरण्याची माहिती उपलब्ध नाही कारण तुमच्या प्लॉटची रिचार्ज माहिती संपली आहे. कृपया रिचार्ज करा आणि नंतर खताच्या वापराबद्दल माहिती मिळवा.
messages.en: Information on the use of fertilizer for your crop is not available because the recharge information of your plot is exhausted. Please recharge and then get information about the use of fertilizer.
messages.content_transliterated: tumachya pikasathi khat vaparanyachi mahiti upalabdh nahi karan tumachya plotchy recharge mahiti sampali aahe. kripaya recharge kara ani nantar khatachya vaparabaddal mahiti milava.

messages.content:
તમારા પાક માટે, હાલની ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ મુજબ, તમે નીચેના ખાતરોનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

### હાલની ફર્ટિગેશન (સપ્તાહ 1, વેજેટેટિવ ગ્રોથ)
- **ફર્ટિલાઇઝર**: 
  - 12-61-0: 4 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
  - Urea: 2 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
- અથવા
  - 24-24-0: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
  - ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80%: 1.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
- અથવા
  - Urea: 3 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
  - ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80%: 3.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

**નોંધ**: ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડને અન્ય ખાતરોની એપ્લિકેશન કરતા 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા અલગથી લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.

### આગામી ફર્ટિગેશન (સપ્તાહ 2)
- **ફર્ટિલાઇઝર**: 
  - 12-61-0: 4 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
  - Urea: 2 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
  - મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 4 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
- અથવા
  - 24-24-0: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
  - ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80%: 1.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
  - મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 4 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
- અથવા
  - Urea: 3 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
  - ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80%: 3.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
  - મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 4 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

આ માહિતીનો ઉપયોગ કરીને, તમે તમારા પાક માટે યોગ્ય ખાતર પસંદ કરી શકો છો.
messages.en:
For your crop, as per the current fertigation schedule, you can use the following fertilizers:

### Current Fertigation (Week 1, Negative Growth)
- **Fertilizer**: 
  - 12-61-0: 4 kg/acre
  - Urea: 2 kg/acre
-or
  - 24-24-0: 6 kg/acre
  - Phosphoric Acid 80%: 1.5 kg/acre
-or
  - Urea: 3 kg/acre
  - Phosphoric Acid 80%: 3.5 kg/acre

**Note**: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before applying other fertilizers.

### Next Fertigation (Week 2)
- **Fertilizer**: 
  - 12-61-0: 4 kg/acre
  - Urea: 2 kg/acre
  - Magnesium sulphate: 4 kg/acre
-or
  - 24-24-0: 6 kg/acre
  - Phosphoric Acid 80%: 1.5 kg/acre
  - Magnesium sulphate: 4 kg/acre
-or
  - Urea: 3 kg/acre
  - Phosphoric Acid 80%: 3.5 kg/acre
  - Magnesium sulphate: 4 kg/acre

Using this information, you can choose the right fertilizer for your crop.
messages.content_transliterated:
tamara pak mate, halani fertigation schedule mujab, tame nicena khatarono upayog kari shako cho:

### halani fertigation (saptah 1, vegetative growth)
- **fertilizer**: 
  - 12-61-0: 4 kilogram/acre
  - Urea: 2 kilogram/acre
- athava
  - 24-24-0: 6 kilogram/acre
  - phosphoric acid 80%: 1.5 kilogram/acre
- athava
  - Urea: 3 kilogram/acre
  - phosphoric acid 80%: 3.5 kilogram/acre

**nondh**: phosphoric esidane any khataroni application karta 15-20 minute pela alagathi lagu karvu joie.

### agami fertigation (saptah 2)
- **fertilizer**: 
  - 12-61-0: 4 kilogram/acre
  - Urea: 2 kilogram/acre
  - magnesium sulphate: 4 kilogram/acre
- athava
  - 24-24-0: 6 kilogram/acre
  - phosphoric acid 80%: 1.5 kilogram/acre
  - magnesium sulphate: 4 kilogram/acre
- athava
  - Urea: 3 kilogram/acre
  - phosphoric acid 80%: 3.5 kilogram/acre
  - magnesium sulphate: 4 kilogram/acre

a mahitino upayog karine, tame tamara pak mate yogy khatar pasand kari shako cho.
